GV03sb_10_u:0: agnireṣa purastāccīyate saṃvatsara upariṣṭānmahadukthaṃ śasyate prajāpatervisrastasyāgraṃ
GV03sb_10_u:1: sa yaḥ sa prajāpatirvyasraṃsata saṃvatsaraḥ so'tha yānyasya tāni parvāṇi
GV03sb_10_u:3: sa yaḥ sa saṃvatsaraḥ prajāpatirvyasraṃsata ayameva sa
GV03sb_10_u:5_0: yānyasya tānyahorātrāṇi parvāṇi vyasraṃsanteṣṭakā eva tāstadyadetā upadadhāti yānyevāsya tānyahorātrāṇi parvāṇi vyasraṃsanta
GV03sb_10_u:6: atha yo'sya so'graṃ raso'gacat mahattadukthaṃ tamasya taṃ
GV03sb_10_u:7: rasamṛkṣāmābhyāmanuyanti tadyattatra yajuḥ purastādetyabhinetaiva tadeti yathādo
GV03sb_10_u:9_0: tamadhvaryurgraheṇa gṛhṇāti yadgṛhṇāti tasmādgrahastasmiadyajuḥ purastādeti taṃ saṃvatsara āpnuvanti nnudgātā mahāvratena
GV03sb_10_u:9_1: rasaṃ dadhāti sarvāṇi haitāni sāmāni yanmahāvrataṃ tadasmintsarvaiḥ sāmabhī rasaṃ dadhāti tasminhotā mahatokthena rasaṃ dadhāti
GV03sb_10_u:9_2: sarvā haitā ṛco yanmahadukthaṃ tadasmintsarvābhirṛgbhī rasaṃ dadhāti
GV03sb_10_u:10_0: te yadā stuvate yadānuśaṃsati athāsminnetaṃ vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti tadenameṣa raso'pyeti na vai mahāvratamidaṃ stutaṃ śeta iti
GV03sb_10_u:10_1: paśyanti no mahadidamukthamityagnimeva paśyantyātmā hyagnistadenamete ubhe raso bhūtvāpīta ṛkca sāma ca tadubhe ṛkṣāme yajurapītaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:11: sa eṣa mithuno'gniḥ prathamā ca citirdvitīyā ca tṛtīyā ca caturthī cātha pañcamyai
GV03sb_10_u:13_0: aṅguṣṭhā iti pumāṃsaḥ aṅgulaya iti striyaḥ karṇāviti pumāṃsau bhruvāviti striyā oṣṭhāviti pumāṃsau nāsike iti striyau dantā
GV03sb_10_u:13_1: iti pumāṃso jihveti strī sarva eva mithunaḥ so'nena mithunenātmanaitam mithunamagnimapyeti
GV03sb_10_u:14: eṣātrāpītiḥ apyahaivam mithuna itthaṃ ha tvevāpi mithuno vāgeveyaṃ yo'yamagniścito vācā hi cīyate'tha yaścite'gnirnidhīyate sa prāṇaḥ prāṇo
GV03sb_10_u:15: vai vāco vṛṣā prāṇo mithunaṃ vāgvevāyamātmātha ya ātmanprāṇastanmithunaṃ so'nena
GV03sb_10_u:17: eṣo atrāpītiḥ na ha vā asyāputratāyai kā cana śaṅkā bhavati ya evametau mithunāvātmānaṃ cāgniṃ ca vedānnaṃ ha tvevāyamātmā dakṣiṇānnaṃ vanute yo na ātmeti hyapyṛṣiṇābhyuktam
GV03sb_10_u:18_0: tadidamannaṃ jagdhaṃ dvedhā bhavati yadasyāmṛtamūrdhvaṃ tannābherūrdhvai prāṇairuccarati tadvāyumapyetyatha yanmartyam parāk
GV03sb_10_u:18_1: tannābhimatyeti taddvayam bhūtvemāmapyeti mūtraṃ ca purīṣaṃ ca tadyadimāmapyeti yo'yamagniścitastaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:19: tadapyetyatha yadvāyumapyeti yaścite'gnirnidhīyate taṃ tadapyetyeṣo evātrāpītiḥ
GV03sb_10_u:20_0: prajāpatirimāṃlokānaipsat sa etaṃ vayovidhamātmānamapaśyadagniṃ taṃ vyadhatta tenemaṃ lokamāpnotsa dvitīyaṃ vayovidhamātmānamapaśyanmahāvrataṃ
GV03sb_10_u:22: ayaṃ vāva loka eṣo'gniścitaḥ antarikṣam mahāvrataṃ dyaurmahadukthaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:23: tasmādetāni sarvāṇi sahopeyādagnim mahāvratam mahadukthaṃ saha hīme lokā asṛjyanta tadyadagniḥ prathamaścīyate'yaṃ hyeṣāṃ lokānām prathamo'sṛjyatetyadhidevatam
GV03sb_10_u:24: athādhyātmam mana evāgniḥ prāṇo mahāvrataṃ vāṅmahadukthaṃ tasmādetāni sarvāṇi sahopeyātsaha hi manaḥ prāṇo vāktadyadagniḥ prathamaścīyate mano hi prathamam prāṇānām
GV03sb_10_u:25: ātmaivāgniḥ prāṇo mahāvrataṃ vāṅ mahadukthaṃ tasmādetāni sarvāṇi sahopeyātsaha hyātmā prāṇo vāktadyadagniḥ prathamaścīyata ātmā hi prathamaḥ sambhavataḥ sambhavati
GV03sb_10_u:26_0: śira evāgniḥ prāṇo mahāvratamātmā mahadukthaṃ tasmādetāni sarvāṇi sahopeyātsaha hi śiraḥ prāṇa ātmā tadyadagniḥ prathamaścīyate
GV03sb_10_u:26_1: śiro hi prathamaṃ jāyamānasya jāyate tasmādyatraitāni sarvāṇi saha kriyante mahadevokthamātamāṃ khyāyata ātmā hi mahaduktham
GV03sb_10_u:27: tadāhuḥ yadetāni sarvāṇi saha durupāpāni kaiteṣāmupāptiriti jyotiṣṭoma evāgniṣṭome jyotiṣṭomenaivāgniṣṭomena
GV03sb_10_u:28_0: tasya vā etasya jyotiṣṭomasyāgniṣṭomasya trivṛdbahiṣpavamānaṃ tadvratasya śiraḥ pañcadaśasaptadaśā uttarau pavamānau tau
GV03sb_10_u:28_1: pakṣau pañcadaśaṃ hoturājyaṃ saptadaśam pṛṣṭhamekaviṃśaṃ yajñāyajñiyaṃ tatpucam
GV03sb_10_u:29_0: tayorvā etayoḥ pañcadaśasaptadaśayordvātriṃśatstotriyāstato yāḥ pañcaviṃśatiḥ sa pañcaviṃśa ātmātha yāḥ saptātiyanti tāḥ
GV03sb_10_u:29_1: parimādaḥ paśavo haitāḥ paśavaḥ parimāda etāvadvai mahāvrataṃ tadetadatraiva mahāvratamāpnoti
GV03sb_10_u:30_0: atha hotā sapta candāṃsi śaṃsati caturuttarāṇyekarcāni virāḍaṣṭamāni teṣāṃ tisraścāśītayo'kṣarāṇi pañcacatvāriṃśacca tato
GV03sb_10_u:30_1: yā aśītayaḥ saivāśītīnāmāptiraśītibhirhi mahadukthamākhyāyate'tha yāni pañcacatvāriṃśattato yāni pañcaviṃśatiḥ sa pañcaviṃśa
GV03sb_10_u:30_2: ātmā yatra vā ātmā tadeva śirastatpakṣapucānyatha yāni viṃśatistadāvapanametāvadvai mahadukthaṃ tadetadatraiva mahadukthamāpnoti
GV03sb_10_u:30_3: tāni vā etāni sarvāṇi jyotiṣṭoma evāgniṣṭoma āpyante tasmādu jyotiṣṭomenaivāgniṣṭomena yajeta
GV03sb_10_u:31: prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata sa ūrdhvebhya eva prāṇebhyo devānasṛjata ye'vāñcaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:32: prāṇāstebhyo martyāḥ prajā athordhvameva mṛtyum prajābhyo'ttāramasṛjata
GV03sb_10_u:33: tasya ha prajāpateḥ ardhameva martyamāsīdardhamamṛtaṃ tadyadasya martyamāsīttena mṛtyorabibhetsa bibhyādimām prāviśaddvayam bhūtvā mṛccāpaśca
GV03sb_10_u:34: sa mṛtyurdevānabravīt kva nu so'bhūdyo no'sṛṣṭeti tvadbibhyadimām prāvikṣaditi so'bravīttaṃ vā anvicāma taṃ sambharāma na vā ahaṃ taṃ hiṃsiṣyāmīti taṃ devā asyā
GV03sb_10_u:35: adhi samabharanyadasyāpsvāsīttā apaḥ samabharannatha yadasyāṃ tām mṛdaṃ tadubhayaṃ sambhṛtya mṛdaṃ cāpaśceṣṭakāmakurvaṃstasmādetadubhayamiṣṭakā bhavati mṛccāpaśca
GV03sb_10_u:36: tadetā vā asya tāḥ pañca martyāstanva āsaṃloma tvaṅmāṃsamasthi majjāthaitā amṛtā mano vākprāṇaścakṣuḥ
GV03sb_10_u:37: sa yaḥ sa prajāpatiḥ ayameva sa yo'yamagniścīyate'tha yā asya tāḥ pañca martyāstanva āsannetāstāḥ purīṣacitayo'tha yā amṛtā etāstā iṣṭakācitayaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:38_0: te devā abruvan amṛtamimaṃ karavāmeti tasyaitābhyāmamṛtābhyāṃ tanūbhyāmetām martyāṃ tanūm parigṛhyāmṛtāmakurvanniṣṭakācitibhyām
GV03sb_10_u:38_1: purīṣacitiṃ tathā dvitīyāṃ tathā tṛtīyāṃ tathā caturthīm atha pañcamīṃ citimupadhāya purīṣaṃ nivapati tatra vakarṇīṃ ca svayamātṛṇāṃ
GV03sb_10_u:38_2: copadadhāti hiraṇyaśakalaiḥ prokṣatyagnimabhyādadhāti sā saptamī citistadamṛtamevamasyaitābhyāmamṛtābhyāṃ tanūbhyāmetām martyāṃ
GV03sb_10_u:38_3: tanūm parigṛhyāmṛtāmakurvanniṣṭakācitibhyām purīṣacitiṃ tato vai prajāpatiramṛto'bhavattathaivaitadyajamāna etamamṛtamātmānaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:40_0: te vai devāstaṃ nāviduḥ yadyenaṃ sarvaṃ vākurvanna vā sarvaṃ yadyati vārecayanna vābhyāpayaṃsta etāmṛcamapaśyandhāmacadagnirindro
GV03sb_10_u:40_1: brahmā devo bṛhaspatiḥ sacetaso viśve devā yajñam prāvantu naḥ śubha iti
GV03sb_10_u:41_0: tasyā astyevāgneyam astyaindramasti vaiśvadevaṃ tadyadasyā āgneyaṃ yadevaitasyāgnerāgneyaṃ tadasya tena samaskurvanyadaindraṃ
GV03sb_10_u:41_1: tadaindreṇa yadvaiśvadevaṃ tadvaiśvadevena tamatraiva sarvaṃ kṛtsnaṃ samaskurvan
GV03sb_10_u:42_0: tadyadetayopatiṣṭhate yadevāsyātra vidvānvāvidvānvāti vā recayati na vābhyāpayati tadevāsyaitayā sarvamāpnoti yadasya kiṃ
GV03sb_10_u:42_1: cānāptamanuṣṭubdhāmacadbhavati vāgvā anuṣṭubvāgdhāmacadvācaivāsya tadāpnoti yadasya kiṃ cānāptam purīṣavatīṃ citiṃ kṛtvopatiṣṭhetetyu
GV03sb_10_u:42_2: haika āhustatra hisā sarvā kṛtsnā bhavatīti
GV03sb_10_u:43_0: tadu vā āhuḥ yaviṣṭhavatyaivopatiṣṭhetaitaddhāsya priyaṃ dhāma yadyaviṣṭha iti tadyadasya priyaṃ dhāma tenāsya tadāpnoti
GV03sb_10_u:43_1: yadasya kiṃ cānāptamāgneyyāgnikarma hi gāyatryāgāyatro'gniryāvānagniryāvatyasya mātrā tāvataivasya ta dāpnoti yadasya kiṃ
GV03sb_10_u:43_2: cānāptamaniruktayā sarvaṃ vā aniruktaṃ sarveṇaivāsya tadāpnoti yadasya kiṃ cānāptaṃ tvaṃ yaviṣṭha dāśuṣa iti tasyokto bandhuḥ
GV03sb_10_u:43_3: purīṣavatīṃ citiṃ kṛtvopatiṣṭheta tatra hi sā sarvā kṛtsnā bhavati
GV03sb_10_u:44_0: ubhayaṃ haitadagre prajāpatirāsa martyaṃ caivāmṛtaṃ ca tasya prāṇā evāmṛtā āsuḥ śarīram martyaṃ sa etena karmaṇaitayāvṛtaikadhājaramamṛtamātmānamakuruta
GV03sb_10_u:44_1: tathaivaitadyajamāna ubhayameva bhavati martyaṃ caivāmṛtaṃ ca tasya prāṇā evāmṛtā bhavanti śarīram martyaṃ sa etena karmaṇaitayāvṛtaikadhājaramamṛtamātmānaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:45_0: sa prathamāṃ citiṃ cinoti sā hāsyaiṣā prāṇa eva tadvai tadamṛtamṛtaṃ hi prāṇaḥ saiṣāmṛtacitiratha purīṣaṃ nivapati taddhāsyaitanmajjaiva
GV03sb_10_u:45_1: tadvai tanmartyam martyo hi majjā tadetasminnamṛte pratiṣṭhāpayati tenāsyaitadamṛtam bhavati
GV03sb_10_u:46: dvitīyāṃ citiṃ cinoti sā hāsyaiṣāpāna eva tadvai tadamṛtamamṛtaṃ hyapānaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:47: saiṣāmṛtacitistadetanmartyamubhayato'mṛtena parigṛhṇāti tenāsyaitadamṛtam bhavatyatha purīṣaṃ nivapati taddhāsyaitadasthyeva tadvai tanmartyam
GV03sb_10_u:48: martyaṃ hyasthi tadetasminnamṛte pratiṣṭhāpayati tenāsyaitadamṛtam bhavati
GV03sb_10_u:49_0: tṛtīyāṃ citiṃ cinoti sā hāsyaiṣā vyāna eva tadvai tadamṛtamamṛtaṃ hi vyānaḥ saiṣāmṛtacitistadetanmartyamubhayato'mṛtena parigṛhṇāti
GV03sb_10_u:49_1: tenāsyaitadamṛtam bhavatyatha purīṣaṃ nivapati taddhāsyaitatsnāvaiva tadvai tanmartyaṃ hi snāva tadetasminnamṛte pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV03sb_10_u:50: caturthīṃ citiṃ cinoti sā hāsyaiṣodāna eva tadvai tadamṛtamamṛtam hyudānaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:51: saiṣāmṛtacitistadetanmartyamubhayato'mṛtena parigṛhṇāti tenāsyaitadamṛtam bhavatyatha purīṣaṃ nivapati taddhāsyaitanmāṃsameva tadvai tanmartyam
GV03sb_10_u:52: martyaṃ hi māṃsaṃ tadetasminnamṛte pratiṣṭhāpayati tenāsyaitadamṛtam bhavati
GV03sb_10_u:53_0: pañcamīṃ citiṃ cinoti sā hāsyaiṣā samāna eva tadvai tadamṛtamamṛtaṃ hi samānaḥ saiṣāmṛtacitistadetanmartyamubhayato'mṛtena
GV03sb_10_u:53_1: parigṛhṇāti tenāsyaitadamṛtam bhavatyatha purīṣaṃ nivapati taddhāsyaitanmeda eva tadvai tanmartyam martyaṃ hi
GV03sb_10_u:55: ṣaṣṭhīṃ citiṃ cinoti sā hāsyaiṣā vāgevatadvai tadamṛ tamamṛtaṃ hi
GV03sb_10_u:56: vākṣaiṣāmṛtacitistadetanmartyamubhayato'mṛtena parigṛhṇāti tenāsyaitadamṛtam bhavatyatha puriṣaṃ nivapati taddhāsyaitadasṛgeva tvageva tadvai
GV03sb_10_u:57: tanmartyam martyaṃ hyasṛṅmartyā tvaktadetasminnamṛte pratiṣṭhāpayati tenāsyaitadamṛtam bhavati
GV03sb_10_u:58: tā vā etāḥ ṣaḍiṣṭakācitayaḥ ṣaṭ purīṣacitayastaddvādaśa dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ
GV03sb_10_u:59: saṃvatsaro'gniryāvānagniryāvatyasya mātrā tāvataiva tatprajāpatirekadhājaramamṛtamātmānamakuruta tathaivaitadyajamāna ekadhājaramamṛtamātmānaṃ kurute
GV03sb_10_u:60: atha vikarṇīṃ ca svayamātṛṇāṃ copadhāya hiraṇyaśakalaiḥ prokṣatyagnimabhyādadhāti rūpameva
GV03sb_10_u:62_0: tadyadantatastasmādidamantyamātmano rūpaṃ tasmādāhurhiraṇmayaḥ prajāpatiriti tathaivaitadyajamāno rūpameva hiraṇmayamantata
GV03sb_10_u:62_1: ātmanaḥ kurute tadyadantatastasmādidamantyamātmano rūpaṃ tasmādye caitadvidurye ca na
GV03sb_10_u:64: taddhaitacāṇḍilyaśca sāptarathavāhaniśca ācāryāntevāsibau vyūdāte rūpamevāsyaitaditi ha smāha śāṇḍilyo lomānīti sāptarathavāhaniḥ
GV03sb_10_u:65: sa hovāca śāṇḍilyaḥ rūpaṃ vāva lomavadrūpamalomakaṃ rūpamevāsyaitaditi tadvai tattathā yathā tacāṇḍilya uvāca saṃcite'gniḥ praṇīyate praṇītādūrdhvaṃ samidha āhutaya iti hūyante
GV03sb_10_u:66_0: prāṇena vai devā annamadanti agniru devānām prāṇastasmātprāgdevebhyo juhvati prāṇena hi devā annamadantyapānena manuṣyā annamadanti
GV03sb_10_u:67_0: tadāhuḥ na vayaso'gnicidaśnīyādvayo vā eṣa rūpam bhavati yo'gniṃ cinuta īśvara ārtimātostasmānna vayaso'gnicidaśnīyāditi
GV03sb_10_u:67_1: tadvai kāmamevaivaṃvidaśnīyādagnervā eṣa rūpam bhavati yo'gniṃ cinute sarvaṃ vā idamagnerannaṃ sarvam ma
GV03sb_10_u:69: tadāhuḥ kiṃ tadagnau kriyate yena yajamānaḥ punarmṛtyumapajayatītyagnirvā eṣa devatā bhavati yo'gniṃ cinute'mṛtamu vā agniḥ śrīrdevāḥ śriyaṃ gacati yaśo
GV03sb_10_u:70: devā yaśo ha bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV03sb_10_u:71: sarve haite yajñā yo'yamagniścitaḥ sa yatpaśumālabhate tadagnyādheyamatha
GV03sb_10_u:72: yadukhāṃ sambharati tānyagnyādheyahavīmṣyatha yaddīkṣate tadagnihotramatha yaddīkṣitaḥ samidhāvādadhāti te agnihotrāhutī
GV03sb_10_u:73_0: te vai sāyamprātarādadhāti sāyamprātarhyagnihotrāhutī juhvati samānena mantreṇa samānena hi mantreṇāgnihotrāhutī juhvatyatha
GV03sb_10_u:73_1: yadvanīvāhanaṃ ca bhasmanaścābhyavaharaṇaṃ tau darśapūrṇamāsāvatha yadgārhapatyaṃ cinoti tāni cāturmāsyānyatha yadūrdhvaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:74: yadūrdhvaṃ sarvauṣadhātprācīnaṃ citibhyaste paśubandhā ya evaiteṣu yajñeṣu viṣṇukramāste viṣṇukramā yajjapyaṃ tadvātsapram
GV03sb_10_u:75: saumyo'dhvaraḥ prathamā citiḥ yatprācīnaṃ savebhyo rājasūyo dvitīyā
GV03sb_10_u:76_0: vājapeyastṛtīyāśvamedhaścaturthyagnisavaḥ pañcamī yaiścitaṃ sāmabhiḥ parigāyati tanmahāvratamatha yattatrodgātuḥ purastājjapyaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:76_1: tacatarudriyaṃ vasordhārā mahadukthamatha yadūrdhvaṃ sāmabhyaḥ prācīnaṃ vasordhārāyai yadeva tatra hotuḥ purastājjapyaṃ tattadatha
GV03sb_10_u:76_2: yadūrdhvaṃ vasordhārāyai te gṛhamedhā etāvanto vai sarve
GV03sb_10_u:79: tāvatī ha tasminyajña ūrgardhamāse'rdhamāse darśapūrṇamāsayājī caturṣu-caturṣu
GV03sb_10_u:82: śate-śate saṃvatsareśvagnicitkāmamaśnāti kāmaṃ na taddhaitadyāvacataṃ saṃvatsarāstāvadamṛtamanantamaparyantaṃ sa so haitadevaṃ vedaivaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:84: prajāpatiḥ svargaṃ lokamajigāṃsat sarve vai paśavaḥ prajāpatiḥ puruṣo'śvo
GV03sb_10_u:85_0: gauravirajaḥ sa etai rūpairnāśaknotsa etaṃ vayovidhamātmānamapaśyadagniṃ taṃ vyadhatta so'nupasamuhyānupādhāyodapipatiṣatsa
GV03sb_10_u:85_1: nāśaknotsa upasamuhyopadhāyodapatattasmādapyetarhi vayāṃsi yadaiva pakṣā upasamūhante
GV03sb_10_u:87: taṃ vā aṅgulibhirmimīte puruṣo vai yajñastenedaṃ sarvam mitaṃ tasyaiṣāvamā mātrā yadaṅgulayastadyāsyāvamā mātrā tāmasya tadāpnoti tayainaṃ tanmimīte
GV03sb_10_u:91: vyudūhati tadyāvadevopasamūhati tāvadvyudūhati tannāhaivātirecayati no kanīyaḥ karoti tathā pucasya tathottarasya pakṣasya
GV03sb_10_u:92: atha nirṇāmau pakṣayoḥ karoti nirṇāmau hi vayasaḥ pakṣayorbhavato vitṛtīye vitṛtīye hi vayasaḥ pakṣayornirṇāmau bhavato'ntare vitṛtīye'ntare hi vitṛtīye vayasaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:93: pakṣayornirṇāmau bhavataḥ sa caturaṅgulameva purastādudūhati caturaṅgulam paścādupasamūhati tadyāvadevodūhati tāvadupasamūhati tannāhaivātirecayati no kanīyaḥ karoti
GV03sb_10_u:94: sa tasminnirṇāme ekāmiṣṭakāmupadadhāti tadyeyaṃ vayasaḥ patato nirṇāmādekā nāḍyupaśete tāṃ tatkarotyatho idam
GV03sb_10_u:95_0: atha vakrau karoti vakrau hi vayasaḥ pakṣau bhavataḥ sa caturaṅgulameva paścādudūhati caturaṅgulam purastādupasamūhati tadyāvadevodūhati
GV03sb_10_u:95_1: tāvadupasamūhati tannāhaivātirecayati no kanīyaḥ karoti atha rūpamūttamaṃ karoti atraiṣa sarvo'gniḥ saṃskṛtastasmindevā etadrūpamuttamamadadhustathaivāsminnayametadrūpamuttamaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:95_2: dadhāti sa sahasramṛjvālikhitā iṣṭakāḥ karoti sahasramityālikhitāḥ sahasramityālikhitāḥ
GV03sb_10_u:96: atha pañcamīṃ citimupadhāya tredhāgniṃ vimimīte sa madhyame vitṛtīye sahasramṛjvālikhitā iṣṭakā upadadhāti tadyānīmāni vayasaḥ pratyañci śīrṣṇa ā pucādṛjūni lomāni tāni tatkaroti
GV03sb_10_u:97: atha sahasramityālikhitā dakṣiṇata upadadhāti tadyānīmāni vayaso dakṣiṇato vakrāṇi lomāni tāni tatkaroti
GV03sb_10_u:98_0: atha sahasramityālikhitā uttarata upadadhāti tadyānīmāni vayasa uttarato vakrāṇi lomāni tāni tatkaroti sahasreṇa sarvaṃ vai
GV03sb_10_u:98_1: sahasraṃ sarveṇaivāsminnetadrūpamuttamaṃ dadhāti tribhiḥ sahasraistrivṛdagniryāvānagniryāvatyasya mātrā tāvataivāsminnetadrūpamuttamaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:99_0: yānvai tāntsapta puruṣān ekam puruṣamakurvantsa prajāpatirabhavatsa prajā asṛjata sa prajāḥ sṛṣṭvordhva udakrāmatsa etaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:99_1: lokamagacadyatraiṣa etattapati no ha tarhyanya etasmādatra yajñiya āsa taṃ devā yajñenaiva yaṣṭumadhriyanta
GV03sb_10_u:100: tasmādetadṛṣiṇābhyanūktam yajñena yajñamayajanta devā iti yajñena hi taṃ yajñamayajanta devāstāni dharmāṇi prathamānyāsanniti te hi dharmāḥ
GV03sb_10_u:101: prathame'kriyanta te ha nākam mahimānaḥ sacanteti svargo vai loko nāko
GV03sb_10_u:102: devā mahimānaste devāḥ svargaṃ lokaṃ sacanta ye taṃ yajñamayajannityetat
GV03sb_10_u:103_0: yatra pūrve sādhyāḥ santi devā iti prāṇā vai sādhyā devāsta etamagra evamasādhayannetadeva bubhūṣantasta u evāpyetarhi sādhayanti

GV03sb_10_u:106: sa vai saptapuruṣo bhavati saptapuruṣo hyayam puruṣo yaccatvāra ātmā trayaḥ pakṣapucāni catvāro hi tasya puruṣasyātmā trayaḥ pakṣapucāni
GV03sb_10_u:107_0: taṃ vā udbāhunā puruṣeṇa mimīte puruṣo vai yajñastenedaṃ sarvam mitaṃ tasyaiṣā paramā mātrā yadudbāhustadyāsya paramā mātrā
GV03sb_10_u:107_1: tāmasya tadāpnoti tayainaṃ tanmimīte tatropa yatprapadenābhyucrito bhavati tatpariśridbhirāpnoti tasmādu bāhyenaiva lekhām
GV03sb_10_u:108: atha pakṣayoraratnī upādadhāti pakṣayostadvīryaṃ dadhāti bāhū vai pakṣau bāhubhyāmu vā annamadyate'nnāyaiva tamavakāśāṃ karoti tadyatpakṣayoraratnī
GV03sb_10_u:110_0: atha puce vitastimupādadhāti pratiṣṭhāyāṃ tadvīryaṃ dadhāti pratiṣṭhā vai pucaṃ hasto vitastirhastena vā annamadyate'nnāyaiva
GV03sb_10_u:110_1: tamavakāśaṃ karoti tadyatpuce vitastimupādadhātyanna evainaṃ tatpratiṣṭhāpayati tadyattatra kanīya
GV03sb_10_u:111: upādadhātyannehyevainaṃ tatpratiṣṭhāpayatyatho etāvadvā idam mitam bhavatyetāvadidaṃ tadyadevam mimīta etasyaivāptyai
GV03sb_10_u:112_0: yā vā iyaṃ vediḥ saptavidhasya eṣā vedermātrā sa devayajanamadhyavasāya pūrvayā dvārā patnīśālam prapadya gārhapatyāyoddhatyāvokṣati
GV03sb_10_u:112_1: gārhapatyasyoddhatātsapta prācaḥ prakramānprakrāmati tataḥ prāñcaṃ vyāmaṃ vimimīte tasya madhya āhavanīyāyoddhatyāvokṣati
GV03sb_10_u:113_0: te vā ete vyāmaikādaśāḥ prakramā antarā vedyantaṃ ca gārhapatyaṃ caikādaśākṣarā triṣṭubvajrastriṣṭubvīryaṃ triṣṭubvajreṇaivaitadvīryeṇa
GV03sb_10_u:114: saiṣā vederyoniḥ etasyai vai yonerdevā vedim prājanayannatha ya eṣa vyāmaḥ sā gārhapatyasya yoniretasyai vai yonerdevā gārhapatyam prājanayangārhapatyādāhavanīyam
GV03sb_10_u:115: sa vedyantāt ṣaṭtriṃśatprakramām prācīṃ vediṃ vimimīte triṃśatam paścāttiraścīṃ caturviṃśatim purastāttannavatiḥ saiṣā navatiprakramā vedistasyāṃ saptavidhamagniṃ vidadhāti
GV03sb_10_u:116_0: tadāhuḥ kathameṣa saptavidha etayā vedyā sampadyata iti daśa vā ime puruṣe prāṇāścatvāryaṅgānyātmā pañcadaśa evaṃ dvitīya
GV03sb_10_u:116_1: evaṃ tṛtīye ṣaṭsu puruṣeṣu navatirathaikaḥ puruṣo'tyeti pāṅkto vai puruṣo loma tvaṅmāṃsamasthi majjā
GV03sb_10_u:117: pāṅkto iyaṃ vediścatasro diśa ātmā pañcamyevameṣa saptavidha etayā vedyā
GV03sb_10_u:119_0: taddhaike uttarā vidhā vidhāsyanta etāṃśca prakramānetaṃ ca vyāmamanuvardhayanti yonimanuvardhayāma iti na tathā kuryānna
GV03sb_10_u:119_1: vai jātaṃ garbhaṃ yoniranuvardhate yāvadvāva yonāvantargarbho bhavati tāvadeva yonirvardhata etāvatyu vā atra garbhasya vṛddhiḥ
GV03sb_10_u:120_0: te ye ha tathā kurvanti etaṃ ha te pitaram prajāpatiṃ sampadaścyāvayanti ta iṣṭvā pāpīyāṃso bhavanti pitaraṃ hi prajāpatiṃ
GV03sb_10_u:120_1: sampadaścyāvayanti sā yāvatyeṣā saptavidhasya vedistāvatīṃ caturdaśa kṛtva ekaśatavidhasya vediṃ vimimīte
GV03sb_10_u:121: atha ṣaṭtriṃśatprakramāṃ rajjum mimīte tāṃ saptadhā samasyati tasyai trīnbhāgānprāca upadadhāti niḥsṛjati caturaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:122: atha triṃśatprakramām mimīte tāṃ saptadhā samasyati tasyai trīnbhāgānpaścādupadadhāti niḥsṛjati
GV03sb_10_u:123: atha caturviṃśatiprakramām mimīte tāṃ saptadhā samasyati tasyai trīnbhāgānpurastādupadadhāti niḥsṛjati catura iti nu vedivimānam
GV03sb_10_u:124_0: athāgnervidhāḥ aṣṭāviṃśatiḥ prāñcaḥ puruṣā aṣṭāviṃśatistiryañcaḥ sa ātmā caturdaśa puruṣā dakṣiṇaḥ pakṣaścaturdaśottaraścaturdaśa
GV03sb_10_u:124_1: pucaṃ caturdaśāratnīndakṣiṇe pakṣa upadadhāti caturdaśottare caturdaśa vitastīḥ puca iti nvaṣṭānavateḥ puruṣāṇām mātrā sādhimānānām
GV03sb_10_u:125: atha tripuruṣāṃ rajjum mimīte tāṃ saptadhā samasyati tasyai caturo bhāgānātmannupadadhāti trīnpakṣapuceṣu
GV03sb_10_u:126: athāratnimātrīm mimīte tāṃ saptadhā samasyati tasyai trīnbhāgāndakṣiṇe pakṣa upadadhāti trīnevottare niḥsṛjati caturaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:127: atha vitastimātrīm mimīte tāṃ saptadhā samasyati tasyai trīnbhāgānpuca upadadhāti niḥsṛjati catura evameṣa ekaśatavidha etayā vedyā sampadyate
GV03sb_10_u:128: tadāhuḥ yattrayodaśa puruṣā atiyanti kathamete sampado na cyavanta iti yā vā etasya saptamasya puruṣasya sampatsaivaiteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ sampat
GV03sb_10_u:129: atho āhuḥ prajāpatirevātmānaṃ vidhāya tasya yatra-yatra nyūnamāsīttadetaiḥ samāpūrayata teno evāpi sampanna iti
GV03sb_10_u:130: taddhaike ekavidham prathamaṃ vidadhatyathaikottaramāparimitavidhānna tathā kuryāt
GV03sb_10_u:131_0: saptavidho vā agre prajāpatirasṛjyata sa ātmānaṃ vidadhāna aitsa ekaśatavidhe'tiṣṭhata sa yo'rvācīnaṃ saptavidhādvidhatta
GV03sb_10_u:131_1: etaṃ ha sa pitaram prajāpatiṃ vicinatti sa iṣṭvā pāpīyānbhavati yathā śreyāṃsaṃ hiṃsitvātha sa
GV03sb_10_u:132_0: ekaśatavidhamatividhatte'smātsa sarvasmādbahirdhā niṣpadyate sarvamu hīdam prajāpatistasmādu saptavidhameva prathamaṃ vidadhītāthaikottaramaikaśatavidhādekaśatavidhaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:132_1: tu nātividadhīta nāhaitam pitaram prajāpatiṃ vicinatti no asmātsarvasmādbahirdhā niṣpadyate
GV03sb_10_u:133_0: saṃvatsaro vai prajāpatiḥ agniru sarve kāmāḥ so'yaṃ saṃvatsaraḥ prajāpatirakāmayatāgniṃ sarvānkāmānātmānamabhisaṃcinvīyeti
GV03sb_10_u:133_1: sa ekaśatadhātmānaṃ vyadhatta sa ekaśatadhātmānaṃ vidhāyāgniṃ sarvānkāmānātmānamabhisamacinuta sa sarve kāmā abhavattasmānna
GV03sb_10_u:134: saṃvatsaraḥ sarve kāmā iti na ha saṃvatsarātkaścana bahirdhā kāmo'sti
GV03sb_10_u:135: tathaivaitadyajamānaḥ ekaśatadhātmānaṃ vidhāyāgniṃ sarvānkāmānātmānamabhisaṃcinute sa sarve kāmā bhavati tasmānna kaścana bahirdhā kāmo bhavati
GV03sb_10_u:136: sa yaḥ sa saṃvatsaro'sau sa ādityaḥ sa eṣa ekaśatavidhastasya raśmayaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:137: śataṃ vidhā eṣa evaikaśatatamo ya eṣa tapatyasmintsarvasminpratiṣṭhitastathaivaitadyajamāna ekaśatadhātmānaṃ vidhāyāsmintsarvasminpratitiṣṭhati
GV03sb_10_u:138_0: atha vā ekaśatavidhaḥ saptavidhamabhisampadyata ekaśatadhā vā asāvādityo vihitaḥ saptasu devalokeṣu pratiṣṭhitaḥ sapta vai
GV03sb_10_u:138_1: devalokāścatasro diśastraya ime lokā ete vai sapta devalokāsteṣveṣa pratiṣṭhitastathaivaitadyajamāna ekaśatadhātmānaṃ vidhāya
GV03sb_10_u:139_0: yadvevaikaśatavidhaḥ saptavidhamabhisampadyata ekaśatadhā vā asāvādityo vihitaḥ saptasvṛtuṣu saptasu stomeṣu saptasu pṛṣṭheṣu
GV03sb_10_u:139_1: saptasu candaḥsu saptasu prāṇeṣu saptasu dikṣu pratiṣṭhitastathaivaitadyajamāna ekaśatadhātmānaṃ vidhāyaitasmintsarvasminpratitiṣṭhati
GV03sb_10_u:140_0: yadvevaikaśatavidhaḥ saptavidhamabhisampadyata ekaśatadhā vā asāvādityo vihitaḥ saptākṣare brahmanpratiṣṭhitaḥ saptākṣaraṃ
GV03sb_10_u:140_1: vai brahmargityekamakṣaraṃ yajuriti dve sāmeti dve atha yadato'nyadbrahmaiva taddvyakṣaraṃ vai brahma
GV03sb_10_u:141: tadetatsarvaṃ saptākṣaram brahma tasminneṣa pratiṣṭhitastathaivaitadyajamāna ekaśatadhātmānaṃ vidhāya saptākṣare brahmanpratitiṣṭhati
GV03sb_10_u:142: tasmādu saptabhiḥ-saptabhiḥ pariśrayanti tasmādekaśatavidhaḥ saptavidhamabhisampadyate'tha vai saptavidha ekaśatavidhamabhisampadyate
GV03sb_10_u:143: saptavidho vā agre prajāpatirasṛjyata sa etamekaśatadhātmānaṃ vihitamapaśyatprāṇabhṛtsu pañcāśadiṣṭakāḥ pañcāśadyajūṃṣi tacataṃ sādanaṃ ca
GV03sb_10_u:144_0: sūdadohāścaika=\atatame tatsamānaṃ sādayitvā hi sūdadohasādhivadati sa etenaikaśatavidhenātmanemāṃ jitimajayadimāṃ vyaṣṭiṃ
GV03sb_10_u:144_1: vyāśnuta tathaivaitadyajamāna etenaikaśatavidhenātmanemāṃ jitiṃ jayatīmāṃ vyaṣṭiṃ
GV03sb_10_u:145: vyaśnuta evamu saptavidha ekaśatavidhamabhisampadyate sa ya evaikaśatavidhaḥ sa saptavidho yaḥ saptavidhaḥ sa ekaśatavidha iti nu vidhānam
GV03sb_10_u:146_0: athātaścayanasyaiva antaropasadau cinotyetadvai devā abibhayuryadvai na imamiha rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā na hanyuriti ta etāḥ puro'paśyannupasada
GV03sb_10_u:146_1: imāneva lokānime vai lokāḥ purastāḥ prāpadyanta tāḥ prapadyābhaye'nāṣṭra etamātmānaṃ samaskurvata tathaivaitadyajamāna etāḥ
GV03sb_10_u:147_0: yadvevāntaropasadau cinoti etadvai devā abibhayuryadvai na imamiha rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā na hanyuriti ta etānvajrānapaśyannupasado
GV03sb_10_u:147_1: vajrā vā upasadastānprāpadyanta tānprapadyābhaye'nāṣṭra etamātmānaṃ samaskurvata tathaivaitadyajamāna
GV03sb_10_u:149_0: etadu ha yajñe tapaḥ yadupasadastapo vā upasadastadyattapasi cīyate tasmāttāpaścitastadvai yāvadevopasadbhiścaranti tāvatpravargyeṇa
GV03sb_10_u:150: ahorātrāṇi vā upasadaḥ ādityaḥ pravargyo'muṃ tadādityamahorātreṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati tasmādeṣo'horātreṣu
GV03sb_10_u:151: atha yadi caturviṃśatiḥ caturviṃśatirvā ardhamāsā ardhamāsā upasada ādityaḥ pravargyo'muṃ tadādityamardhamāseṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati tasmādeṣo'rdhamāseṣu
GV03sb_10_u:153: atha yadi dvādaśa dvādaśa vai māsā māsā upasada ādityaḥ pravargyo'muṃ
GV03sb_10_u:154: tadādityam māseṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati tasmādeṣa māseṣu pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:155: atha yadi ṣaṭ ṣaḍvā ṛtava ṛtava upasada ādityaḥ pravargyo'muṃ
GV03sb_10_u:157: atha yadi tisraḥ trayo vā ime lokā ime lokā upasada ādityaḥ pravargyo'muṃ
GV03sb_10_u:158: tadādityameṣu lokeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati tasmādeṣa eṣu lokeṣu pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:159: athātaścitipurīṣāṇāmeva mīmāṃsā māsam prathamā citirmāsam purīṣametāvānvāsantika ṛtau kāmastadyāvānvāsantika ṛtau kāmastaṃ tatsarvamātmānamabhisaṃcinute
GV03sb_10_u:160: māsaṃ dvitīyā māsam purīṣametāvāngraiṣma ṛtau kāmastadyāvāngraiṣma ṛtau kāmastaṃ tatsarvamātmānamabhisaṃcinute
GV03sb_10_u:161: māsaṃ tṛtīyā māsam purīṣametāvānvārṣika ṛtau kāmastadyāvānvārṣika ṛtau kāmastaṃ tatsarvamātmānamabhisaṃcinute
GV03sb_10_u:162: māsaṃ caturthī māsam purīṣametāvāñcārada ṛtau kāmastadyāvāñcārada ṛtau kāmastaṃ tatsarvamātmānamabhisaṃcinute
GV03sb_10_u:163_0: atha pañcamyai citeḥ asapatnā virājaśca prathamāhamupadadhāti stomabhāgā ekaikāmanvahaṃ tāḥ skṛtsādayati sakṛtsūdadohasādhivadati
GV03sb_10_u:163_1: tūṣṇīm māsaṃ stomabhāgāpurīṣamabhiharantyetāvānhaimantika stau kāmastadyāvānhaimantika ṛtau kāmastaṃ tatsarvamātmānamabhisaṃcinute
GV03sb_10_u:164_0: māsaṃ ṣaṣṭhī māsam purīṣametāvāñcaiśira ṛtau kāmastadyāvāñcaiśira ṛtau kāmastaṃ tatsarvamātmānamabhisaṃcinuta etāvānvai dvādaśasu
GV03sb_10_u:164_1: māseṣu kāmaḥ ṣaṭsvṛtuṣu tadyāvāndvādaśasu māseṣu kāmaḥ ṣaṭsvṛtuṣu taṃ tatsarvamātmānamabhisaṃcinute
GV03sb_10_u:165_0: atha trīṇyahānyupātiyanti yadahaḥ śatarudriyaṃ juhoti yadaharupavasatho yadahaḥ prasutastadyatteṣvahaḥsūpasadā caranti tāni
GV03sb_10_u:165_1: tasya māsasyāhorātrāṇyatha yatpravargyeṇa tadu tasminnṛtāvādityam pratiṣṭhāpayatyetāvānvai trayodaśasu māseṣu kāmaḥ saptasvṛtuṣu
GV03sb_10_u:165_2: tadyāvāṃstrayodaśasu māseṣu kāmaḥ saptasvṛtuṣu taṃ tatsarvamātmānamabhisaṃcinute
GV03sb_10_u:166_0: sa saṃvatsaram prasutaḥ syāt sarvaṃ vai saṃvatsaraḥ sarvamekaśatavidhaḥ sarveṇaiva tatsarvamāpnoti yadi saṃvatsaraṃ na śaknuyādviśvajitā
GV03sb_10_u:166_1: sarvapṛṣṭhenātirātreṇa yajeta tasmintsarvavedasaṃ dadyātsarvaṃ vai viśvajitsarvapṛṣṭho'tirātraḥ sarvaṃ sarvavedasaṃ sarvamekaśatavidhaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:167_0: saṃvatsaro vai prajāpatirekaśatavidhaḥ tasyāhorātrāṇyardhamāsā māsā ṛtavaḥ ṣaṣṭirmāsasyāhorātrāṇi māsi vai saṃvatsarasyāhorātrāṇyāpyante
GV03sb_10_u:167_1: caturviṃśatirardhamāsāstrayodaśa māsāstraya ṛtavastāḥ śataṃ vidhāḥ saṃvatsara evaikaśatatamī vidhā
GV03sb_10_u:168: sa ṛtubhireva saptavidhaḥ ṣaḍṛtavaḥ saṃvatsara eva saptamī vidhā tasyaitasya saṃvatsarasyaitattejo ya eṣa tapati tasya raśmayaḥ śataṃ vidhā maṇḍalamevaikaśatatamī vidhā
GV03sb_10_u:169: sa digbhireva saptavidhaḥ ye prācyāṃ diśi raśmayaḥ saikā vidhā ye dakṣiṇāyāṃ saikā ye pratīcyāṃ saikā ya udīcyāṃ saikā ya ūrdhvāyāṃ saikā ye'vācyāṃ saikā maṇḍalameva saptamī vidhā
GV03sb_10_u:170: tasyaitasya purastātkāmapro lokaḥ amṛtaṃ vai kāmapramamṛtamevāsya
GV03sb_10_u:172: tadetadvasucitraṃ rādhaḥ tadeṣa savitā vibhaktābhyaḥ prajābhyo
GV03sb_10_u:173: vibhajatyapyoṣadhibhyo'pi vanaspatibhyo bhūya-iva ha tvekābhyaḥ prayacati

GV03sb_10_u:271_2: ha vai tṛptimetāṃ gatimetamānandametamātmānamabhisambhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV03sb_10_u:272: tadetadyajurupāṃśvaniruktam prāṇo vai yajurupāṃśvāyatano vai prāṇastadya enaṃ nirbruvantam brūyādaniruktāṃ devatāṃ niravocatprāṇa enaṃ hāsyatīti tathā haiva syāt
GV03sb_10_u:273_0: tasya ha yo niruktamāvirbhāvaṃ veda āvirbhavati kīrtyā yaśasopāṃśu yajuṣādhvaryurgrahaṃ gṛhṇāti gṛhītaḥ sanna āvirbhavatyupāṃśu
GV03sb_10_u:273_1: yajuṣāgniṃ cinoti citaḥ saṃcita āvirbhavatyupāṃśu yajuṣā havirnirvapati śṛtaṃ niṣṭhitamāvirbhavatyevaṃ yatkiṃ copāṃśu karoti
GV03sb_10_u:273_2: kṛtaṃ niṣṭhitamāvirbhavati tasya ha ya etamevaṃ niruktamāvirbhāvaṃ vedāvirbhavati kīrtyā yaśasā brahmavarcasena kṣipra u
GV03sb_10_u:273_3: haivāvidaṃ gacati sa ha yajureva bhavati yajuṣainamācakṣate
GV03sb_10_u:274: prajāpatiṃ visrastam yatra devāḥ samaskurvaṃstamukhāyāṃ yonau reto bhūtamasiñcanyonirvā ukhā tasmā etatsaṃvatsare'nnaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:276_0: tathaivaitadyajamānaḥ ātmānamukhāyāṃ yonau reto bhūtaṃ siñcati yonirvā ukhā tasmā etatsaṃvatsare'nnaṃ saṃskaroti yo'yamagniścitastadātmanā
GV03sb_10_u:276_1: paridadhāti tadātmanā parihitamātmaiva bhavati tasmādannamātmanā parihitamātmaiva
GV03sb_10_u:278_0: taṃ nidadhāti vauṣaḍiti vaugiti vā eṣa ṣaḍitīdaṃ ṣaṭcitikamannaṃ kṛtvāsmā apidadhātyātmasammitaṃ yadu vā ātmasammitamannaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:278_1: tadavati tanna hinasti yadbhūyo hinasti tadyatkanīyo na tadavati
GV03sb_10_u:279: sa eṣa evārkaḥ yametamatrāgnimāharanti tasyaitadannaṃkyaṃ yo'yamagniścitastadarkyaṃ yajuṣṭa eṣa eva mahāṃstasyaitadannaṃ vrataṃ tanmahāvrataṃ sāmata eṣa u evoktasyaitadannaṃ thaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:281_0: athendrāgnī vā asṛjyetām brahma ca kṣatraṃ cāgnireva brahmendraḥ kṣatraṃ tau sṛṣṭau nānaivāstāṃ tāvabrūtāṃ na vā itthaṃ santau
GV03sb_10_u:281_1: śakṣyāvaḥ prajāḥ prajanayitumekaṃ rūpamubhāvasāveti tāvekaṃ rūpamubhāvabhavatām
GV03sb_10_u:282: tau yau tāvindrāgnī etau tau rukmaśca puruṣaśca rukma evendraḥ
GV03sb_10_u:284: hiraṇmayau bhavato jyotirvai hiraṇyaṃ jyotirindrāgni! amṛtaṃ hiraṇvamamṛtamindrāgnī
GV03sb_10_u:285_0: tāvetāvindrāgnī eva cinvanti yaddhi kiṃ caiṣṭakamagnireva tattasmāttadagninā pacanti yaddhi kiṃ cāgninā pacantyagnireva tadatha
GV03sb_10_u:285_1: yatpurīṣaṃ sa indrastasmāttadagninā na pacanti nedagnirevāsannendra iti tasmādetāvindrāgnī eva citau
GV03sb_10_u:287: rūpeṇemāḥ prajāḥ prajanayataḥ saiṣaikaiveṣṭakāgnireva tāmeṣa sarvo'gnirabhisampadyate saiveṣṭakāsampattadetadekamevākṣaraṃ vaugiti tadeṣa
GV03sb_10_u:289_0: taddhaitatpaśyannṛṣirabhyanūvāda bhūtam bhaviṣyatprastaumi mahadbrahmaikamakṣaram bahu brahmaikamakṣaramityetaddhyevākṣaraṃ
GV03sb_10_u:289_1: sarve devāḥ sarvāṇi bhūtānyabhisampadyante tadetadbrahma ca kṣatraṃ cāgnireva brahmendraḥ kṣatramindrāgnī vai viśve devā
GV03sb_10_u:290_0: etaddha sma vai tadvidvāñcyāparṇaḥ sāyakāyana āha yadvai ma idaṃ karma samāpsyata mamaiva prajā salvānāṃ rājāno'bhaviṣyanmama
GV03sb_10_u:290_1: brāhmaṇā mama vaiśyā yattu ma etāvatkarmaṇaḥ samāpi tena ma ubhayathā salvānprajātirekṣyata iti sa eṣa
GV03sb_10_u:292: etaddha vai tacāṇḍilyaḥ vāmakakṣāyaṇāya procyovāca śrīmānyaśasvyannādo bhaviṣyasīti śrīmānha vai yaśasvyannādo bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV03sb_10_u:293: sa eṣo'gniḥ prajāpatireva ta devā etamagnim prajāpatiṃ saṃskṛtyāthāsmā
GV03sb_10_u:295_0: tamadhvaryurgraheṇa gṛhṇāti yadgṛhṇāti tasmādgrahastasminnudgātā mahāvratena rasaṃ dadhāti sarvāṇi haitāni sāmāni yanmahāvrataṃ
GV03sb_10_u:295_1: tadasmintsarvaiḥ sāmabhī rasaṃ dadhāti tasminhotā mahatokthena rasaṃ dadhāti sarvā haitā ṛco yanmahadukthaṃ tadasmintsarvābhirṛgbhī
GV03sb_10_u:296_0: te yadā stuvate yadānuśaṃsati athāsminnetaṃ vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti vaugiti vā eṣa ṣaḍitīdaṃ ṣaḍvidhamannaṃ kṛtvāsmā apidadhātyātmasammitaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:296_1: yadu vā ātmasammitamannaṃ tadavati tanna hinasti yadbhūyo hinasti tadyatkanīyo na
GV03sb_10_u:298_0: sa eṣa evārkaḥ yo'yamagniścitastasyaitadannaṃ kyameṣa mahāvratīyo grahastadarkyaṃ yajuṣṭa eṣa eva mahāṃstasyaitadannaṃ vrataṃ
GV03sb_10_u:298_1: tanmahāvrataṃ sāmata eṣa u evoktadannaṃ thaṃ tadukthamṛktastadetadekaṃ sattredhākhyāyate
GV03sb_10_u:299_0: sa eṣa saṃvatsaraḥ prājāpatiragniḥ tasyārdhameva sāvitrāṇyardhaṃ vaiśvakarmaṇānyaṣṭāvevāsya kalāḥ sāvitrāṇyaṣṭau vaiśvakarmaṇānyatha
GV03sb_10_u:299_1: yadetadantareṇa karma kriyate sa eva saptadaśaḥ prajāpatiryo vai kalā manuṣyāṇāmakṣaraṃ taddevānām
GV03sb_10_u:300_0: tadvai lometi dve akṣare tvagiti dve asṛgiti dve meda iti dve māṃsamiti dve snāveti dve asthīti dve majjeti dve tāḥ ṣoḍaśa
GV03sb_10_u:300_1: kalā atha ya etadantareṇa prāṇaḥ saṃcarati sa eva saptadaśaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GV03sb_10_u:301: tasmā etasmai prāṇāya etāḥ ṣoḍaśa kalā annamabhiharanti tā yadānabhihartuṃ
GV03sb_10_u:302: dhriyante'thaitā eva jagdhvotkrāmati tasmādu haitadaśiśiṣatastṛpramiva bhavati prāṇairadyamānasya tasmādu haitadupatāpī kṛśa-iva bhavati prāṇairhi jagdho
GV03sb_10_u:304: tasmā etasmai saptadaśāya prajāpataye etatsaptadaśamannaṃ samaskurvanya
GV03sb_10_u:306: saumyo'dhvaro'tha yā asya tāḥ ṣoḍaśa kalā ete te ṣoḍaśartvijastasmānna saptadaśamṛtvijaṃ kurvīta nedatirecayānītyatha ya evātra raso yā āhutayo hūyante tadeva saptadaśamannam
GV03sb_10_u:307_0: te yadā stuvate yadānuśaṃsati athāsminnetaṃ vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti vaugiti vā eṣa ṣaḍitīdaṃ ṣaḍvidhamannaṃ kṛtvāsmā apidadhātyātmasammitaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:307_1: yadu vā ātmasammitamannaṃ tadavati tanna hinasti yadbhūyo hinasti tadyatkanīyo na
GV03sb_10_u:311_0: yajuṣṭa eṣa eva mahāṃstasyaitadannaṃ vrataṃ tanmahāvrataṃ sāmata eṣa u evoktasyaitadannaṃ thaṃ tadukthamṛktastadetadekaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:311_1: sattredhākhyāyate sa etenānnena sahordhva udakrāmatsa yaḥ sa udakrāmadasau sa ādityo'tha yena tenānnena sahodakrāmadeṣa sa
GV03sb_10_u:312_0: sa eṣa evārko ya eṣa tapati tasyaitadannaṃ kyameṣa candramāstadarkyaṃ yajuṣṭa eṣa eva mahāṃstasyaitadannaṃ vrataṃ tanmahāvrataṃ
GV03sb_10_u:312_1: sāmata eṣa u evoktasyaitadannaṃ thaṃ tadukthamṛktastadetadekaṃ sattredhākhyāyata ityadhidevatam
GV03sb_10_u:313_0: athādhyātmam prāṇo vā arkastasyānnameva kyaṃ tadarkyaṃ yajuṣṭaḥ prāṇa eva māhāṃstasyānnameva vrataṃ tanmahāvrataṃ sāmataḥ
GV03sb_10_u:313_1: prāṇa u evoktasyānnameva thaṃ tadukthamṛktastadetadekaṃ sattredhākhyāyate sa eṣa
GV03sb_10_u:315: saṃvatsaro vai prajāpatiragniḥ somo rājā candramāḥ sa ha svayamevātmānam proce yajñavacase rājastambāyanāya yāvanti vāva me jyotīṃṣi tāvatyo ma iṣṭakā iti
GV03sb_10_u:316_0: tasya vā etasya saṃvatsarasya prajāpateḥ sapta ca śatāni viṃśatiścāhorātrāṇi jyotīṃṣi tā iṣṭakāḥ ṣaṣṭiśca trīṇi ca śatāṇi
GV03sb_10_u:316_1: pariśritaḥ ṣaṣṭiśca trīṇi ca śatāni yajuṣmatyaḥ so'yaṃ saṃvatsaraḥ prajāpatiḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni sasṛje yacca prāṇi yaccāprāṇamubhayāndevamanuṣyāntsa
GV03sb_10_u:316_2: sarvāṇi bhūtāni sṛṣṭvā riricāna-iva mene sa mṛtyorbibhayāṃ cakāra
GV03sb_10_u:317: sa hekṣāṃ cakre kathaṃ nvahamināni sarvāṇi bhūtāni punarātmannāvapeya punarātmandadhīya kathaṃ nvahamevaiṣāṃ sarveṣām bhūtānām punarātmā syāmiti
GV03sb_10_u:318: sa dvedhātmānaṃ vyauhat ṣaṣṭiśca trīṇi ca śatānyanyatarasyeṣṭakā abhavannevamanyatarasya sa na vyāpnot
GV03sb_10_u:322: pañcātmano'kuruta catuścatvāriṃśaṃ śatamekaikasyeṣṭakā abhavantsa naiva vyāpnot
GV03sb_10_u:323: ṣaḍātmano'kuruta viṃśatiśateṣṭakāntsa naiva vyāpnonna saptadhā vyabhavat
GV03sb_10_u:327: dvādaśātmano'kuruta ṣaṣṭīṣṭakāntsa naiva vyāpnonna trayodaśadhā vyabhavanna caturdaśadhā
GV03sb_10_u:329: ṣoḍaśātmano'kuruta pañcacatvāriṃśadiṣṭakāntsa naiva vyāpnonna saptadaśadhā vyabhavat
GV03sb_10_u:330: aṣṭādaśātmano'kuruta catvāriṃśadiṣṭakāntsa naiva vyāśnonnaikāṃ na viṃśatidhā vyabhavat
GV03sb_10_u:333: caturviṃśatimātmano'kuruta triṃśadiṣṭakāntso'trātiṣṭhata pañcadaśe vyūhe tadyatpañcadaśe vyūhe'tiṣṭhata tasmātpañcadaśāpūryamāṇasya rūpāṇi pañcadaśāpakṣīyamāṇasya
GV03sb_10_u:335_0: etaiścaturviṃśatyā triṃśadiṣṭakairātmabhirna vyabhavatsa pañcadaśāhno rūpāṇyapaśyadātmanastanvo muhūrtālokampṛṇāḥ pañcadaśaiva
GV03sb_10_u:335_1: rātrestadyanmuhu trāyante tasmānmuhurtā atha yatkṣudrāḥ santa imāṃlokānāpūrayanti
GV03sb_10_u:337: eṣa vā idaṃ sarvam pacati ahorātrairardhamāsairmāsairṛtubhiḥ saṃvatsareṇa tadamunā pakvamayam pacati pakvasya pakteti ha smāha bhāradvājo'gnimamunā
GV03sb_10_u:339: tāni saṃvatsare daśa ca sahasrāṇyaṣṭau ca śatāni samapadyanta so'trātiṣṭhata daśasu ca sahasreṣvaṣṭāsu ca śateṣu
GV03sb_10_u:340_0: atha sarvāṇi bhūtāni paryaikṣat sa trayyāmeva vidyāyāṃ sarvāṇi bhūtānyapaśyadatra hi sarveṣāṃ candasāmātmā sarveṣāṃ stomānāṃ
GV03sb_10_u:340_1: sarveṣām prāṇānāṃ sarveṣāṃ devānāmetadvā astyetaddhyamṛtaṃ yaddhyamṛtaṃ taddhyastyetadu tadyanmartyam
GV03sb_10_u:341: sa aikṣata prajāpatiḥ trayyāṃ vāva vidyāyāṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāni hanta trayomeva vidyāmātmānamabhisaṃskaravā
GV03sb_10_u:342: sa ṛco vyauhat dvādaśa bṛhatīsahasrāṇyetāvatyo harco yāḥ prajāpatisṛṣṭāstāstriṃśattame vyūhe paṅktiṣvatiṣṭhanta tā yattriṃśattame
GV03sb_10_u:343: vyūhe'tiṣṭhanta tasmāttriṃśanmāsasya rātrayo'tha yatpaṅktiṣu tasmātpāṅktaḥ prajāpatistā aṣṭāśataṃ śatāni paṅktayo'bhavan
GV03sb_10_u:344_0: athetarau vedau vyauhat dvādaśaiva bṛhatīsahasrāṇyaṣṭau yajuṣāṃ catvāri sāmnāmetāvaddhaitayorvedayoryatprajāpatisṛṣṭaṃ tau
GV03sb_10_u:344_1: triṃśattame vyūhe paṅktiṣvatiṣṭhetāṃ tau yattriṃśattame vyūhe'tiṣṭhetāṃ tasmāttriṃśanmāsasya
GV03sb_10_u:345: rātrayo'tha yatpaṅktiṣu tasmātpāṅktaḥ prajāpatistā aṣṭāśatameva śatāni paṅktayo'bhavan
GV03sb_10_u:346: te sarve trayo vedāḥ daśa ca sahasrāṇyaṣṭau ca śatānyaśītonāmabhavantsa
GV03sb_10_u:348_0: sa es-u triṣu lokeṣūkhāyām yonau reto bhūtamātmānamasiñcaccandomayaṃ stomamayam prāṇamayaṃ devatāmayaṃ tasyārdhamāse prathama
GV03sb_10_u:348_1: ātmā samaskriyata davīyasi paro davīyasi paraḥ saṃvatsara eva sarvaḥ kṛtsnaḥ samaskriyata
GV03sb_10_u:349_0: tadyatpariśritamupādhatta tadrātrimupādhatta tadanu pañcadaśa muhūrtānmuhūrtānanu pañcadaśāśītīratha yadyajuṣmatīmupādhatta
GV03sb_10_u:349_1: tadaharupādhatta tadanu pañcadaśa muhūrtānmuhūrtānanu pañcadaśāśītīrevametāṃ trayīṃ vidyāmātmannāvapatātmannakuruta so'traiva
GV03sb_10_u:349_2: sarveṣām bhūtānāmātmābhavaccandomaya stomamayaḥ prāṇamayo devatāmayaḥ sa etanmaya eva bhūtvordhva udakrāmatsa yaḥ sa udakrāmadeṣa
GV03sb_10_u:350: tasyaiṣā pratiṣṭhā ya eṣa tapatyetasmādevādhyacīyataitasminnadhyacīyatātmana evainaṃ tanniramimītātmanaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:351_0: sa yadagniṃ ceṣyamāṇo dīkṣate yathaiva tatprajāpatireṣu triṣu lokeṣūkhāyāṃ yonau reto bhūtamātmānamasiñcadevamevaiṣa etadātmānamukhāyāṃ
GV03sb_10_u:351_1: yonau reto bhūtaṃ siñcati candomayaṃ stomamayam prāṇamayaṃ devatāmayaṃ tasyārdhamāse prathama ātmā saṃskriyate davīyasi paro
GV03sb_10_u:351_2: davīyasi paraḥ saṃvatsara eva sarvaḥ kṛtsnaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:353_0: tadyatpariśritamupadhatte tadrātrimupadhatte tadanu pañcadaśa muhūrtānmuhūrtānanu pañcadaśāśītīratha yadyajuṣmatīmupadhatte
GV03sb_10_u:353_1: tadaharupadhatte tadanu pañcadaśa mūhūrtānmuhūrtānanu pañcadaśāśītīrevametāṃ trayīṃ vidyāmātmannāvapata ātmankurute so'traiva
GV03sb_10_u:353_2: sarveṣām bhūtānāmātmā bhavati candomaya stomamayaḥ prāṇamayo devatāmayaḥ sa etanmaya eva bhūtvordhva
GV03sb_10_u:355_0: tasyaiṣā pratiṣṭhā ya eṣa tapatyetasmādvevādhicīyata etasminnadhicīyata ātmana evainaṃ tannirmimīta ātmanaḥ prajanayati sa
GV03sb_10_u:355_1: yadaivaṃvidasmāllokātpraityathaitamevātmānamabhisambhavati candomayam prāṇamayaṃ devatāmayaṃ sa etanmaya eva bhūtvordhva
GV03sb_10_u:355_2: utkrāmati ya evaṃ vidvānetatkarma kurute yo vaitadevaṃ veda
GV03sb_10_u:356_0: eṣa vai mṛtyuryatsaṃvatsaraḥ eṣa hi martyānāmahorātrābhyāmāyuḥ kṣiṇotyatha mriyante tasmādeṣa eva mṛtyuḥ sa yo haitam mṛtyuṃ
GV03sb_10_u:356_1: saṃvatsaraṃ veda na hāsyaiṣa purā jaraso'horātrābhyāmāyuḥ kṣiṇoti sarvaṃ haivāyureti
GV03sb_10_u:357: eṣa u evāntakaḥ eṣa hi martyānāmahorātrābhyāmāyuṣo'ntaṃ gacatyatha mriyante tasmādeṣa evāntakaḥ sa yo haitamantakam mṛtyuṃ saṃvatsaraṃ veda na
GV03sb_10_u:358: hāsyaiṣa purā jaraso'horātrābhyāmāyuṣo'ntaṃ gacati sarvaṃ haivāyureti
GV03sb_10_u:359: te devāḥ etasmādantakānmṛtyoḥ saṃvatsarātprajāpaterbibhayāṃ cakruryadvai no'yamahorātrābhyāmāyuṣo'ntaṃ na gacediti
GV03sb_10_u:360: ta etānyajñakratūṃstenire agnihotraṃ darśapūrṇamāsau cāturmāsyāni paśubandhaṃ saumyamadhvaraṃ ta etairyajñakratubhiryajamānā nāmṛtatvamānaśire
GV03sb_10_u:361: te hāpyagniṃ cikyire te'parimitā eva pariśrita upadadhuraparimitā
GV03sb_10_u:362: yajuṣmatīraparimitā lokampṛṇā yathedamapyetarhyeka upadadhatīti devā akurvanniti te ha naivāmṛtatvamānaśire
GV03sb_10_u:364: na vai me sarvāṇi rūpāṇyupadhatthāti vaiva recayatha na vābhyāpayatha tasmānnāmṛtā bhavatheti
GV03sb_10_u:365: te hocuḥ tebhyo vai nastvameva tadbrūhi yathā te sarvāṇi
GV03sb_10_u:367_0: sa hovāca ṣaṣṭiṃ ca trīṇi ca śatāni pariśrita upadhatta ṣaṣṭiṃ ca trīṇi ca śatāni yajuṣmatīradhi ṣaṭtriṃśatamatha lokampṛṇā
GV03sb_10_u:367_1: daśa ca sahasrāṇyaṣṭau ca śatānyupadhattātha me sarvāṇi rūpāṇyupadhāsyathāthāmṛtā bhaviṣyatheti te ha tathā devā upadadhustato
GV03sb_10_u:368_0: sa mṛtyurdevānabravīt itthameva sarve manuṣyā amṛtā bhaviṣyantyatha ko mahyam bhāgo bhaviṣyatīti te hocurnāto'paraḥ kaścana
GV03sb_10_u:368_1: saha śarīreṇāmṛto'sadyadaiva tvametam bhāgaṃ harāsā atha vyāvṛtya śarīreṇāmṛto'sadyo'mṛto'sadvidyayā vā karmaṇā veti yadvai
GV03sb_10_u:369: karmaṇā vetyeṣā haiva sā vidyā yadagniretadu haiva tatkarma yadagniḥ
GV03sb_10_u:370_0: te ya evametadviduḥ ye vaitatkarma kurvate mṛtvā punaḥ sambhavanti te sambhavanta evāmṛtatvamabhisambhavantyatha ya evaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:370_1: na vidurye vaitatkarma na kurvate mṛtvā punaḥ sambhavanti ta etasyaivānnam punaḥ-punarbhavanti
GV03sb_10_u:371: sa yadagniṃ cinute etameva tadantakam mṛtyuṃ saṃvatsaram prajāpatimagnimāpnoti yaṃ devā āpnuvannetamupadhatte yathaivainamado devā upādadhata
GV03sb_10_u:373_0: tadyāḥ pariṣritaḥ rātrilokāstā rātrīṇāmeva sāptiḥ kriyate rātrīṇām pratimā tāḥ ṣaṣṭiśca trīṇi ca śatāni bhavanti ṣaṣṭiśca

GV03sb_10_u:470: śaṃsantyetāvatī vai manaso vibhūtiretāvatī visṛṣṭiretāvanmanaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśatsahasrāṇyagnayo'rkāsteṣāmekaika eva tāvānyāvānasau pūrvaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:471: tanmano vācamasṛjata seyaṃ vākṣṛṣṭāvirabubhūṣanniruktatarā mūrtatarā sātmānamanvaicatsā tapo'tapyata sā prāmūrcatsā ṣaṭtriṃśataṃ
GV03sb_10_u:472: sahasrāṇyapaśyadātmano'gnīnarkānvāṅmayānvākcitaste vācaivādhīyanta vācaiṣu grahā agṛhyanta vācāstuvata vācāśaṃsanyatkiṃ ca yajñe karma kriyate yatkiṃ
GV03sb_10_u:473_0: ca yajñiyaṃ karma vācaiva teṣu tadvāṅmayeṣu vākcitsu vāṅmayamakriyata tadyatkiṃ cemāni bhūtāni vācā vadanti teṣāmeva sā kṛtistānevādadhati
GV03sb_10_u:473_1: tāṃścinvanti teṣu grahāngṛhṇanti teṣu stuvate teṣu śaṃsantyetāvatī vai vāco vibhūtiretāvatī visṛṣṭiretāvatī vākṣaṭtriṃśatsahasrāṇyagnayo'rkāsteṣāmekaika
GV03sb_10_u:474: sā vākprāṇamasṛjata so'yam prāṇaḥ sṛṣṭa āvirabubhūṣanniruktataro
GV03sb_10_u:475: mūrtataraḥ sa ātmānamanvaicatsa tapo'tapyata sa prāmūrcatsa ṣaṭtriṃśataṃ
GV03sb_10_u:476: sahasrāṇyapaśyadātmano'gnīnarkānprāṇamayānprāṇacitaste prāṇenaivādhīyanta prāṇenācīyanta prāṇenaiṣu grahā agṛhyanta prāṇenāstuvata
GV03sb_10_u:477_0: prāṇenāśaṃsanyatkiṃ ca yajñe karma kriyate yatkiṃ ca yajñiyaṃ karma prāṇenaiva teṣu tatprāṇamayeṣu prāṇacitsu prāṇamayamakriyata
GV03sb_10_u:477_1: tadyatkiṃ cemāni bhūtāni prāṇena prāṇanti teṣāmeva sā kṛtistānevādadhati tāṃṣcinvanti teṣu grahāngṛhṇanti teṣu stuvate teṣu
GV03sb_10_u:478: śaṃsantyetāvatī vai prāṇasya vibhūtiretāvatī visṛṣṭiretāvānprāṇaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśa
GV03sb_10_u:479: sa prāṇaścakṣurasṛjata tadidaṃ cakṣuḥ sṛṣṭamāvirabubhūṣanniruktataram mūrtataraṃ tadātmānamanvaicattattapo'tapyata
GV03sb_10_u:481_0: cakṣuṣaivādhīyanta cakṣuṣācīyanta cakṣuṣaiṣu grahā agrṛhyanta cakṣuṣāstuvata cakṣuṣāśaṃsanyatkiṃ ca yajñe karma kriyate yatkiṃ
GV03sb_10_u:481_1: ca yajñiyaṃ karma cakṣuṣaiva teṣu taccakṣurmayeṣu cakṣuścitsu cakṣurmayamakriyata tadyatkiṃ cemāni bhūtāni cakṣuṣā paśyanti
GV03sb_10_u:481_2: teṣāmeva sā kṛtistānevādadhati tāṃścinvanti teṣu grahāngṛhṇanti teṣu stuvate teṣu śaṃsantyetāvatī vai cakṣuṣo vibhūtiretāvatī
GV03sb_10_u:482: taccakṣuḥ śrotramasṛjata tadidaṃ śrotraṃ sṛṣṭamāvirabubhūṣanniruktataram mūrtataraṃ tadātmānamanvaicattattapo'tapyata
GV03sb_10_u:484_0: śrotreṇaivādhīyanta śrotreṇācīyanta śrotreṇaiṣu grahā agṛhyanta śrotreṇāstuvata śrotreṇāśaṃsanyatkiṃ ca yajñe karma kriyate
GV03sb_10_u:484_1: yatkiṃ ca yajñiyaṃ karma śrotreṇaiva teṣu tacrotramayeṣu śrotracitsu śrotramayamakriyata tadyatkiṃ cemāni bhūtāni śrotreṇa
GV03sb_10_u:484_2: śṛṇvanti teṣāmeva sā kṛtistānevādadhati tāṃścinvanti teṣu grahāngṛhṇanti teṣu stuvate teṣu śaṃsantyetāvatī vai śrotrasya
GV03sb_10_u:485: tacrotraṃ karmāsṛjata tatprāṇānabhisamamūrcadimaṃ saṃdeghamannasaṃdehamakṛtsnaṃ vai karmarte prāṇebhyo'kṛtsnā uvai prāṇā ṛte
GV03sb_10_u:487: tadidaṃ karma sṛṣṭamāvirabubhūṣat niruktataram mūrtataraṃ tadātmānamanvaicattattapo'tapyata
GV03sb_10_u:488: sahasrāṇyapaśyadātmano'gnīnarkānkarmamayānkarmacitaste karmaṇaivādhīyanta karmaṇācīyanta karmaṇaiṣu grahā agṛhyanta karmaṇāstuvata
GV03sb_10_u:489_0: karmaṇāśaṃsanyatkiṃ ca yajñe karma kriyate yatkiṃ ca yajñiyaṃ karma karmaṇaiva teṣu tatkarmamayeṣu karmacitsu karmamayamakriyata
GV03sb_10_u:489_1: tadyatkiṃ cemāni bhūtāni karma kurvate teṣāmeva sā kṛtistānevādadhati tāṃścinvanti teṣu grahāngṛhṇanti teṣu stuvate teṣu
GV03sb_10_u:490: śaṃsantyetāvatī vai karmaṇo vibhūtiretāvatī visṛṣṭiretāvatkarma ṣaṭtriṃśa
GV03sb_10_u:491: tatkarmāgnimasṛjata āvistarāṃ vā agniḥ karmaṇaḥ karmaṇā hyenaṃ janayanti karmaṇendhate
GV03sb_10_u:492: so'yamagniḥ sṛṣṭa āvirabubhūṣat niruktataro mūrtataraḥ sa ātmānamanvaicatsa
GV03sb_10_u:495_0: tāgninaiṣu grahā agṛhyantāgnināstuvatāgnināśaṃsanyatkiṃ ca yajñe karma kriyate yatkiṃ ca yajñiyaṃ karmāgninaiva teṣu tadagnimayeṣvagnicitsvagnimayamakriyata
GV03sb_10_u:495_1: tadyatkiṃ cemāni bhūtānyagnimindhate teṣāmeva sā kṛtistānevādadhati tāṃścinvanti teṣu grahāngṛhṇanti teṣu stuvate teṣu śaṃsantyetāvatī
GV03sb_10_u:495_2: vā agnervibhūtiretāvatī visṛṣṭiretāvānagniḥ ṣaṭtriṃśatsahasrāṇyagnayo=rkāsteṣāmekaika eva tāvānyāvānasau pūrvaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:496: te haite vidyācita eva tānhaitānevaṃvide sarvadā sarvāṇi bhūtāni cinvantyapi svapate vidyayā haivaita evaṃvidaścitā bhavanti
GV03sb_10_u:497: ayaṃ vāva loka eṣo'gniścitaḥ tasyāpa eva pariśrito manuṣyā yajuṣmatya iṣṭakāḥ sūdadohā oṣadhayaśca vanaspatayaśca purīṣamāhutayaḥ samidho'gnirlokampṛṇā
GV03sb_10_u:498: tadvā etatsarvamagnimevābhisampadyate tatsarvo'gnirlokampṛṇāmabhisampadyate sa yo haitadevaṃ veda lokampṛṇāmenam bhūtametatsarvamabhisampadyate
GV03sb_10_u:499: antarikṣaṃ ha tvevaiṣo'gniścitaḥ tasya dyāvāpṛthivyoreva saṃdhiḥ
GV03sb_10_u:500_0: pariśritaḥ pareṇa hāntarikṣaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī saṃdhattastāḥ pariśrito vayāṃsi yajuṣmatya iṣṭakā varṣaṃ sūdadohā marīcayaḥ purīṣamāhutayaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:500_1: samidho vāyurlokampṛṇā tadvā etatsarvaṃ vāyumevābhisampadyate tatsarvo'gnirlo
GV03sb_10_u:501_0: dyaurha tvevaiṣo'gniścitaḥ tasyāpa eva pariśrito yathā ha vā idaṃ kośaḥ samubjita evamime lokā apsvantastadyā imāṃlokānpareṇāpastāḥ
GV03sb_10_u:501_1: pariśrito devā yajuṣmatya iṣṭakā yadevaitasmiṃloke'nnaṃ tatsūdadohā nakṣatrāṇi purīṣamāhutayaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:502: samidha ādityo lokampṛṇā tadvā etatsarvamādityamevābhisampadyate tatsarvo'gnirlo
GV03sb_10_u:503: ādityo ha tvevaiṣo'gniścitaḥ tasya diśa eva pariśritastāḥ ṣaṣṭiśca trīṇi
GV03sb_10_u:504: ca śatāni bhavanti ṣaṣṭiśca ha vai trīṇi ca śatānyādityaṃ diśaḥ samantam pariyanti raśmayo yajuṣmatya iṣṭakāstāḥ ṣaṣṭiścaiva trīṇi ca śatāni bhavanti ṣaṣṭiśca ha vai trīṇi ca
GV03sb_10_u:505_0: śatānyādityasya raśmayastadyatpariśritsu yajuṣmatīḥ pratyarpayati raśmīṃstaddikṣu pratyarpayatyatha yadantarā diśaśca raśmīṃśca
GV03sb_10_u:505_1: tatsūdadohā atha yaddikṣu ca raśmiṣu cānnaṃ tatpurīṣaṃ tā āhutayastāḥ samidho'tha yaddiśa iti ca
GV03sb_10_u:506: raśmaya iti cākhyāyate tallokampṛṇā tadvā etatsarvaṃ diśa iti caiva raśmaya iti
GV03sb_10_u:509_0: nakṣatrāṇi ha tvevaiṣo'gniścitaḥ tāni vā etāni saptaviṃśatirnakṣatrāṇi saptaviṃśatiḥ saptaviṃśatirhopanakṣatrāṇyekaikaṃ nakṣatramanūpatiṣṭhante
GV03sb_10_u:509_1: tāni sapta ca śatāni viṃśatiścādhi ṣaṭtriṃśattato yāni sapta ca śatāni viṃśatiśceṣṭakā eva tāḥ ṣaṣṭiśca trīṇi ca śatāni pariśritaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:510: yānyadhi ṣaṭtriṃśatsa trayodaśo māsaḥ sa ātmā triṃśadātmā pratiṣṭhā dve śira eva ṣaṭtriṃśyau tadyatte dve bhavato dvyakṣaraṃ hi śiro'tha yadantarā nakṣatre tatsūdadohā
GV03sb_10_u:511: atha yannakṣatreṣvannaṃ tatpurīṣaṃ tā āhutayastāḥ samidho'tha
GV03sb_10_u:515: tā vā etāḥ ekaviṃśatirbṛhatya ekaviṃśo vai svargo loko bṛhatī svargo lokastadeṣa svargaṃ lokamabhisampadyata ekaviṃśaṃ ca stomam bṛhatīṃ ca candaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:516: candāṃsi ha tvevaiṣo'gniścitaḥ tāni vā etāni sapta candāṃsi caturuttarāṇi
GV03sb_10_u:517: tricāni teṣāṃ sapta ca śatāni viṃśatiścākṣarāṇyadhi ṣaṭtriṃśattato yāni sapta ca śatāni viṃśatiśceṣṭakā eva tāḥ ṣaṣṭiśca trīṇi ca śatāni pariśritaḥ ṣaṣṭiśca trīṇi ca śatāni
GV03sb_10_u:518: yajuṣmatyo'tha yānyadhi ṣaṭtriṃśatsa trayodaśo māsaḥ sa ātmā triṃśadātmā pratiṣṭhā dve prāṇā dve śira eva ṣaṭtriṃśyau tadyatte dve bhavato dvyakṣaraṃ hi śiraḥ
GV03sb_10_u:519_0: tasyai vā etasyai ṣaṭtriṃśadakṣarāyai bṛhatyai yāni daśa prathamānyakṣarāṇi sā daśākṣaraikapadātha yāni viṃśatiḥ sā viṃśatyakṣarā
GV03sb_10_u:519_1: dvipadātha yāni triṃśatsā triṃśadakṣarā virāḍatha yāni trayastriṃśatsā trayastriṃśadakṣarātha yāni catustriṃśatsā catustriṃśadakṣarā
GV03sb_10_u:519_2: svarāḍatha yatsarvaiścandobhirayamagniścitastadaticandāstā u sarvā iṣṭakā eveṣṭaketi trīṇyakṣarāṇi tripadā gāyatrī tenaiṣa
GV03sb_10_u:519_3: gāyatro'gnirmṛdāpa iti trīṇyakṣarāṇi tripadā gāyatrī teno evaiṣa gāyatro'tha yadantarā candasī tatsūdadohā atha yaccandaḥsvannaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:520: yaccandāṃsītyākhyāyate tallokampṛṇā tadvā etatsarvaṃ candāṃsītyevākhyāyate tatsarvo'gnirlo
GV03sb_10_u:521: tā vā etāḥ ekaviṃśatirbṛhatya ekaviṃśo vai svargo loko bṛhatī svargo lokastadeṣa svargaṃ lokamabhisampadyata ekaviṃśaṃ ca stomam bṛhatīṃ ca candaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:522: saṃvatsaro ha tvevaiṣo'gniścitaḥ tasya rātraya eva pariśritastāḥ ṣaṣṭiśca trīṇi ca śatāni bhavanti ṣaṣṭiśca ha vai trīṇi ca śatāni saṃvatsarasya rātrayo'hāni
GV03sb_10_u:523_0: yajuṣmatya iṣṭakāstāḥ ṣaṣṭiścaiva trīṇi ca śatāni bhavanti ṣaṣṭiśca ha vai trīṇi ca śatāni saṃvatsarasyāhānyatha yā amūḥ
GV03sb_10_u:523_1: ṣaṭtriṃśadiṣṭakā atiyanti yaḥ sa trayodaśo māsa ātmārdhamāsāśca te māsāśca caturviṃśatirardhamāsā dvādaśa māsā atha yadantarāhorātre
GV03sb_10_u:527: tā vā etāḥ ekaviṃśatirbṛhatya ekaviṃśo vai svargo loko bṛhatī svargo lokastadeṣa svargaṃ lokamabhisampadyate ekaviṃśaṃ ca stomam bṛhatīṃ ca candaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:528_0: ātmā ha tvevaiṣo'gniścitaḥ tasyāsthīnyeva pariśritastāḥ ṣaṣṭiśca trīṇi ca śatāni bhavanti ṣaṣṭiśca ha vai trīṇi ca śatāni
GV03sb_10_u:528_1: puruṣasyāsthīni majjāno yajuṣmatya iṣṭakāstāḥ ṣaṣṭiścaiva trīṇi ca śatāni bhavanti ṣaṣṭiśca ha vai trīṇi ca śatāni puruṣasya
GV03sb_10_u:528_2: majjāno'tha yā amūḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadiṣṭakā atiyanti yaḥ sa trayodaśo māsa ātmā prāṇaḥ sa tasya triṃśadātmanvidhāḥ pratiṣṭhāyāṃ
GV03sb_10_u:528_3: dve śīrṣandve tadyatte dve bhavato dvikapālaṃ hi śiro'tha yenemāni parvāṇi saṃtatāni tatsūdadohā athaitattrayaṃ yenāyamātmā
GV03sb_10_u:528_4: pracanno loma tvaṅmāṃsamiti tatpurīṣaṃ yatpibati tā āhutayo yadaśnāti tāḥ samidho'tha yadātmetyākhyāyate tallokampṛṇā tadvā
GV03sb_10_u:531: sarvāṇi ha tveva bhūtāni sarve devā eṣo'gniścita āpo vai sarve devāḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni
GV03sb_10_u:532: tā haitā āpa evaiṣo'gniścitastasya nāvyā eva pariśritastāḥ ṣaṣṭiśca trīṇi ca śatāni bhavanti ṣaṣṭiśca ha vai trīṇi ca śatānyādityaṃ nāvyāḥ samantam pariyanti nāvyā u
GV03sb_10_u:533_0: eva yajuṣmatya iṣṭakāstāḥ ṣaṣṭiścaiva trīṇi ca śatāni bhavanti ṣaṣṭiśca ha vai trīṇi ca śatānyādityaṃ nāvyā abhikṣarantyatha
GV03sb_10_u:533_1: yadantarā nāvye tatsūdadohā atha yā amūḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadiṣṭakā atiyanti yaḥ sa trayodaśo māsa ātmāyameva sa yo'yaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:535_0: tasyaite pratiṣṭhe rukmaśca puṣkaraparṇaṃ cāpaścādityamaṇḍalaṃ ca srucau bāhū tāvindrāgnī dve svayamātṛṇe iyaṃ cāntarikṣaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:535_1: ca tisro viśvajyotiṣa etā devatā agnirvāyurāditya etā hyeva devatā viśvaṃ jyotirdvādaśartavyāḥ sa saṃvatsaraḥ sa ātmā
GV03sb_10_u:536: pañca pañcacūḍāḥ sa yajñaste devā atha yadvikarṇī ca svayamātṛṇā cāśmā
GV03sb_10_u:537: pṛśniryaścite'gnirnidhīyate sā pañcatrīṃśī lokampṛṇāyai yajuḥ ṣaṭtriṃśī so'syaiṣa
GV03sb_10_u:538: sarvasyāntamevātmā sa eṣa sarvāsāmapām madhye sa eṣa sarvaiḥ kāmaiḥ sampanna āpo vai sarve kāmāḥ sa eṣo'kāmaḥ sarvakāmo na hyetaṃ kasya cana kāmaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:539_0: tadeṣa śloko bhavati vidyayā tadārohanti yatra kāmāḥ parāgatāḥ na tatra dakṣiṇā yanti nāvidvāṃsastapasvina iti na haiva taṃ
GV03sb_10_u:539_1: lokaṃ dakṣiṇābhirna tapasānevaṃvidaśnuta evaṃvidāṃ haiva sa lokaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:540_0: abhram purīṣam candramā āhutayo nakṣatrāṇi samidho yaccandramā nakṣatre vasatyāhutistatsamidhi vasatyetadu vā āhuterannameṣā
GV03sb_10_u:540_1: pratiṣṭhā tasmādāhutirna kṣīyata etaddhyasyā annameṣā pratiṣṭhātha yaddevā ityākhyāyate tallokampṛṇā tadvā etatsarvaṃ devā
GV03sb_10_u:541_0: tadetadṛcābhyuktam viśve devā anu tatte yajurguriti sarvāṇi hyatra bhūtāni sarve devā yajureva bhavanti tatsarvo'gnirlokampṛṇāmabhisampadyate
GV03sb_10_u:541_1: sa yo haitadevaṃ veda lokampṛṇāmenam bhūtametatsarvamabhisampadyate
GV03sb_10_u:542: tā vā etāḥ ekaviṃśatirbṛhatya ekaviṃśo vai svargo loko bṛhatī svargo lokastadeṣa svargaṃ lokamabhisampadyata ekaviṃśaṃ ca stomam bṛhatīṃ ca candaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:543: kuśrirha vājaśravaso'gniṃ cikye taṃ hovāca suśruvāḥ kauṣyo gautama
GV03sb_10_u:545: yadyahainam prāñcamacaiṣīḥ yathā parāca āsīnāya pṛṣṭhato'nnādyamupāharettādṛktanna te haviḥ
GV03sb_10_u:546: yadyu vā enam pratyañcamacaiṣīḥ kasmādasya tarhi paścātpucamakārṣīḥ
GV03sb_10_u:547: yadyu vā enaṃ nyañcamacaiṣīḥ yathā nīcaḥ śayānasya pṛṣṭhe'nnādyam
GV03sb_10_u:549: yadyu vā enamuttānamacaiṣīḥ na vā uttānaṃ vayaḥ svargaṃ lokamabhivahati na tvā svargaṃ lokamabhivakṣyatyasvargya u te bhaviṣyatīti
GV03sb_10_u:550: sa hovāca prāñcamenamacaiṣam pratyañcamenamacaiṣaṃ nyañcamenamacaiṣamuttānamenamacaiṣaṃ sarvā anu diśa enamacaiṣamiti
GV03sb_10_u:551: sa yatprāñcam puruṣamupadadhāti prācyau srucau tatprāṅ cīyate'tha
GV03sb_10_u:552: yatpratyañcaṃ kūrmamupadadhāti pratyañci paśuśīrṣāṇi tatpratyaṅ cīyate'tha yannyañcaṃ kūrmamupadadhāti nyañci paśuśīrṣāṇi nīcīriṣṭakāstannyaṅ cīyate'tha
GV03sb_10_u:554: taduttānaścīyate'tha yatsarvā anu diśaḥ parisarpamiṣṭakā upadadhāti tatsarvataścīyate
GV03sb_10_u:555: atha ha koṣā dhāvayantaḥ nirūḍhaśirasamagnimupādhāvayāṃ cakrusteṣāṃ haika uvāca śrīrvai śiraḥ śriyamasya nirauhītsarvajyāniṃ jyāsyata iti sa ha tathaivāsa
GV03sb_10_u:556: atha haika uvāca prāṇā vai śiraḥ prāṇānasya nirauhītkṣipre'muṃ
GV03sb_10_u:558_0: ūrdhvo vā eṣa etaccīyate yaddarbhastambo logeṣṭakāḥ puṣkaraparṇaṃ rukmapuruṣau srucau svayamātṛṇā dūrveṣṭakā dviyajū retaḥsicau
GV03sb_10_u:558_1: viśvajyotirṛtavye aṣāḍhā kūrmo'tha hāsyaitadeva pratyakṣatamāṃ śiro yaścite'gnirnidhīyate
GV03sb_10_u:560_0: atha haite'ruṇe aupaveśau samājagmuḥ satyayajñaḥ pauluṣirmahāśālo jābālo buḍila āśvatarāśvirindradyumno bhāllaveyo janaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:560_1: śārkarākṣyaste ha vaiśvānare samāsata teṣāṃ ha vaiśvānare na samiyāya te hocuḥ aśvapatirvā ayaṃ kaikeyaḥ samprati vaiśvānaraṃ
GV03sb_10_u:560_2: veda taṃ gacāmeti te hāśvapatiṃ kaikeyamājagmustebhyo ha pṛthagāvasathānpṛthagapacitīḥ pṛthakṣāhasrāntsomānprovāca te ha
GV03sb_10_u:560_3: prātarasaṃvidānā eva samitprāṇayaḥ praticakramira upa tvāyāmeti
GV03sb_10_u:561: sa hovāca yannu bhagavanto'nūcānā anūcānaputrāḥ kimidamiti te
GV03sb_10_u:562: hocurvaiśvānaraṃ ha bhagavāntsamprati veda taṃ no brūhīti sa hovāca samprati khalu nvā ahaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vedābhyādhatta samidha upetā stheti
GV03sb_10_u:563_0: sa hovācāruṇamaupaveśiṃ gautama kaṃ tvaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vettheti pṛthivīmeva rājanniti hovācomiti hovācaiṣa vai vaiśvānara etaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:563_1: hi vai tvam pratiṣṭhāṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vettha tasmāttvam pratiṣṭhitaḥ prajayā paśubhirasi yo vā etam pratiṣṭhāṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vedāpa
GV03sb_10_u:563_2: punarmṛtyuh+ jayati sarvamāyureti pādau tvā etau vaiśvānarasya pādau te'mlāsyatāṃ yadi ha nāgamiṣya iti pādau te'viditāvabhaviṣyatāṃ
GV03sb_10_u:565_0: atha hovāca satyayajñam pauluṣim prācīnayogya kaṃ tvaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vetthetyapa eva rājanniti hovācomiti hovācaiṣa vai rayirvaiśvānara
GV03sb_10_u:565_1: etaṃ hi vai tvaṃ rayiṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vettha tasmāttvaṃ rayimānpuṣṭimānasi yo vā etaṃ rayiṃ
GV03sb_10_u:566: vaiśvānaraṃ vedāpa punarmṛtyuṃ jayati sarvamāyureti vastistvā eṣa vaiśvānarasya vastistvāhāsyadyadi ha nāgamiṣya iti vastiste'vidito'bhaviṣyadyadi ha nāgamiṣya iti
GV03sb_10_u:568_0: atha hovāca mahāśālaṃ jābālam aupamanyava kaṃ tvaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vetthetyākāśameva rājanniti hovācomiti hovācaiṣa vai bahulo
GV03sb_10_u:568_1: vaiśvānara etaṃ hi vai tvam bahulaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vettha tasmāttvam bahuḥ prajayā paśubhirasi yo vā etam bahulaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ
GV03sb_10_u:568_2: vedāpa punarmṛtyuṃ jayati sarvamāyuretyātmā tvā eṣa
GV03sb_10_u:569: vaiśvānarasyātmā tvāhāsyadyadi ha nāgamiṣya ityātmā te'vidito'bhaviṣyadyadi ha nāgamiṣya iti vā
GV03sb_10_u:570_0: atha hovāca buḍilamāśvatarāśvim vaiyāghrapadya kaṃ tvaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vettheti vāyumeva rājanniti hovācomiti hovācaiṣa vai
GV03sb_10_u:570_1: pṛthagvartmā vaiśvānara etaṃ hi vai tvam pṛthagvartmānaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vettha tasmāttvām pṛthagrathaśreṇayo'nuyānti yo vā etam
GV03sb_10_u:570_2: pṛthagvartmānaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vedāpa punarmṛtyuṃ jayati sarvamāyureti prāṇastvā eṣa vaiśvānarasya prāṇastvāhāsyadyadi ha nāgamiṣya
GV03sb_10_u:570_3: iti prāṇaste'vidito'bhaviṣyadyadi ha nāgamiṣya iti vā
GV03sb_10_u:571_0: atha hovācendradyumnam bhāllaveyam vaiyāghrapadya kaṃ tvaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vetthetyādityameva rājanniti hovācomiti hovācaiṣa
GV03sb_10_u:571_1: vai sutatejā vaiśvānara etaṃ hi vai tvaṃ sutatejasaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vettha tasmāttavaiṣa suto'dyamānaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:572_0: pacyamāno'kṣīyamāṇo gṛheṣu tiṣṭhati yo vā etaṃ sutatejasaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vedāpa punarmṛtyuṃ jayati sarvamāyureti cakṣustvā
GV03sb_10_u:572_1: etadvaiśvānarasya cakṣustvāhāsyadyadi ha nāgamiṣya iti cakṣuste'viditamabhaviṣyadyadi ha nāgamiṣya iti vā
GV03sb_10_u:573_0: atha hovāca janaṃ śārkarākṣyam sāyavasa kaṃ tvaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vettheti divameva rājanniti hovācomiti hovācaiṣa vā atiṣṭhā
GV03sb_10_u:573_1: vaiśvānara etaṃ hi vai tvamatiṣṭhāṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vettha tasmāttvaṃ samānānatitiṣṭhasi yo vā etamatiṣṭhāṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vedāpa
GV03sb_10_u:573_2: punarmṛtyuṃ jayati sarvamāyureti mūrdhā tvā eṣa vaiśvānarasya mūrdhā tvāhāsyadyadi ha nāgamiṣya iti mūrdhā te'vidito'bhaviṣyadyadi
GV03sb_10_u:574_0: tānhovāca ete vai yūyam pṛthagvaiśvānarānvidvāṃsaḥ pṛthagannamaghasta prādeśamātramiva ha vai devāḥ suviditā abhisampannāstathā
GV03sb_10_u:575_0: sa hovāca mūrdhānamupadiśanneṣa vā atiṣṭhā vaiśvānara iti cakṣuṣī upadiśannuvācaiṣa vai sutatejā vaiśvānara iti nāsike upadiśannuvācaiṣa
GV03sb_10_u:575_1: vai pṛthagvartmā vaiśvānara iti mukhyamākāśamupadiśannuvācaiṣa vai bahulo
GV03sb_10_u:576: vaiśvānara iti mukhyā apa upadiśannuvācaiṣa vai rayirvaiśvānaro iti cubukamupadiśannuvācaiṣa vai pratiṣṭhā vaiśvānara iti sa
GV03sb_10_u:578: yatpuruṣaḥ sa yo haitamevamagniṃ vaiśvānaram puruṣavidham puruṣe'ntaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:579: pratiṣṭhitaṃ vedāpa punarmṛtyuṃ jayati sarvamāyureti na hāsya bruvāṇaṃ cana vaiśvānaro hinasti
GV03sb_10_u:580: dvayaṃ vā idamattā caivādyaṃ ca tadyadobhayaṃ samāgacatyattaivākhyāyate nādyam
GV03sb_10_u:581: sa vai yaḥ so'ttāgnireva saḥ tasminyatkiṃ cābhyādadhatyāhitaya evāsya tā āhitayo ha vai tā āhutaya ityācakṣate paro'kṣam paro'kṣakāmā hi devāḥ
GV03sb_10_u:582: ādityo vā attā tasya candramā evāhitayaścandramasaṃ hyāditya ādadhatītyadhidevatam
GV03sb_10_u:583: athādhyātmam prāṇo vā attā tasyānnamevāhitayo'nnaṃ hi prāṇa ādadhatīti
GV03sb_10_u:585: athārkasya agnirvā arkastasyāhutaya eva kamāhutayo hyagnaye kam
GV03sb_10_u:586: ādityo vā arkaḥ tasya candramā eva kaṃ candramā hyādityāya
GV03sb_10_u:588: athādhyātmam prāṇo vā arkastasyānnameva kamannaṃ hi prāṇāya kamiti nvevārkasya
GV03sb_10_u:590: ādityo vā uk tasya candramā eva thaṃ candramasā hyāditya
GV03sb_10_u:592_0: athādhyātmam prāṇo vā uktasyānnameva thamannena hi prāṇa uttiṣṭhatīti nvevokthasya sa eṣo'gnividho'rkavidha ukthavidho yatpuruṣaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:592_1: sa yo haitamevamagnividhamarkavidhamukthavidham puruṣamupāste viduṣo haivāsyaivam bhrātṛvyo mlāyati
GV03sb_10_u:593_0: prāṇena vā agnirdīpyate agninā vāyurvāyunāditya ādityena candramāścandramasā nakṣatrāṇi nakṣatrairvidyudetāvatī vai dīptirasmiṃśca
GV03sb_10_u:593_1: loke'muṣmiṃśca sarvā haitāṃ dīptiṃ dīpyate'smiṃśca loke'muṣmiṃśca ya evaṃ veda
GV03sb_10_u:594: satyam brahmetyupāsīta atha khalu kratumayo'yam puruṣaḥ sa yāvatkraturayamasmāllokātpraityevaṃkraturhāmuṃ lokam pretyābhisambhavati
GV03sb_10_u:595_0: sa ātmānamupāsīta manomayam prāṇaśarīram bhārūpamākāśātmānaṃ kāmarūpiṇam manojavasaṃ satyasaṃkalpaṃ satyadhṛtiṃ sarvagandhaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:595_1: sarvarasaṃ sarvā anu diśaḥ prabhūtaṃ sarvamidamabhyāptamavākkamanādaraṃ yathā vrīhirvā yavo vā śyāmāko vā śyāmākataṇḍulo
GV03sb_10_u:595_2: vaivamayamantarātmanpuruṣo hiraṇmayo yathā jyotiradhūmamevaṃ jyāyāndivo jyāyānākāśājjyāyānasyai pṛthivyai jyāyāntsarvebhyo
GV03sb_10_u:595_3: bhūtebhyaḥ sa prāṇasyātmaiṣa ma ātmaitamita ātmānam
GV03sb_10_u:596: pretyābhisambhaviṣyāmīti yasya syādaddhā na vicikitsāstīti ha smāha śāṇḍilya evametaditi
GV03sb_10_u:597_0: uṣā vā aśvasya medhyasya śiraḥ sūryaścakṣurvātaḥ prāṇo vyāttamagnirvaiśvānaraḥ saṃvatsara ātmāśvasya medhyasya dyauṣpṛṣṭhamantarikṣamudaram
GV03sb_10_u:597_1: pṛthivī pājasyaṃ diśaḥ pārśve avāntaradiśaḥ parśava ṛtavo'ṅgāni māsāścārdhamāsāśca parvāṇyahorātrāṇi pratiṣṭhā nakṣatrāṇyasthīni
GV03sb_10_u:598_0: sikatāḥ sindhavo gudā yakṛcca klomānaśca parvatā oṣadhayaśca vanaspatayaśca lomānyudyanpūrvārdho nimlocanjaghanārdho yadvijṛmbhate
GV03sb_10_u:598_1: tadvidyotate yadvidhūnute tatstanayati yanmehati tadvarṣati vāgevāsya vāgaharvā aśvam purastānmahimānvajāyata tasya pūrve
GV03sb_10_u:598_2: samudre yonīrātrirenam paścānmahimānvajāyata tasyāpare samudre yoniretau vā aśvam
GV03sb_10_u:599: mahimānāvabhitaḥ sambabhūvaturhayo bhūtvā devānavahadvājī gandharvānarvāsurānaśvo manuṣyāntsamudra evāsya bandhuḥ samudro yoniḥ
GV03sb_10_u:600: naiveha kiṃ canāgra āsīt mṛtyunaivedamāvṛtamāsīdaśanāyayāśanāyā hi
GV03sb_10_u:602: āpo'jāyantārcate vai me kamabhūditi tadevārkyasyārkatvaṃ kaṃ ha vā asmai bhavati ya evametadarkyasyārkatvaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:603: āpo vā arkaḥ tadyadapāṃ śara āsīttatsamahanyata sā pṛthivyabhavattasyāmaśrāmyattasya śrāntasya taptasya tejo raso
GV03sb_10_u:605: sa tredhātmānaṃ vyakuruta ādityaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vāyuṃ tṛtīyaṃ sa eṣa prāṇastredhāvihitastasya prācī dikśiro'sau cāsau cermāvathāsya pratīcī
GV03sb_10_u:606: dikpucamasau cāsau ca sakthyau dakṣiṇā codīcī ca pārśve dyauṣpṛṣṭhamantarikṣamudaramiyamuraḥ sa eṣo'psu pratiṣṭhito yatra kva
GV03sb_10_u:608_0: so'kāmayata dvitīyo ma ātmā jāyeteti sa manasā vācam mithunaṃ samabhavadaśanāyām mṛtyustadyadreta āsītsa saṃvatsaro'bhavanna
GV03sb_10_u:608_1: ha purā tataḥ saṃvatsara āsa tametāvantaṃ kālamabibharyāvāntsaṃvatsarastametāvataḥ kālasya parastādasṛjata taṃ jātamabhivyādadātsa
GV03sb_10_u:609_0: sa aikṣata yadi vā imamabhimaṃsye kanīyo'nnaṃ kariṣya iti sa tayā vācā tenātmanedaṃ sarvamasṛjata yadidaṃ kiṃ carco yajūṃṣi
GV03sb_10_u:609_1: sāmāni candāṃsi yajñānprajām paśūntsa yadyadevāsṛjata tattadattumadhriyata sarvaṃ vā
GV03sb_10_u:610: attīti tadaditeradititvaṃ sarvasyāttā bhavati sarvamasyānnam bhavati ya evametadaditeradititvaṃ
GV03sb_10_u:611_0: so'kāmayata bhūyasā yajñena bhūyo yajeyeti so'śrāmyatsa tapo'tapyata tasya śrāntasya taptasya yaśo vīryamudakrāmatprāṇā vai
GV03sb_10_u:611_1: yaśo vīryaṃ tatprāṇeṣūtkrānteṣu śarīraṃ śvayitumadhriyata tasya śarīra eva mana āsīt
GV03sb_10_u:612: so'kāmayata medhyaṃ ma idaṃ syādātmanvyanena syāmiti tato'śvaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:613: samabhavadyadaśvattanmedhyamabhūditi tadevāśvamedhasyāśvamedhatvameṣa ha vā aśvamedhaṃ veda ya enamevaṃ veda
GV03sb_10_u:614_0: tamanavarudhyevāmanyata taṃ saṃvatsarasya parastādātmana ālabhata paśūndevatābhyaḥ pratyauhattasam:tsarvadevatyam prokṣitam
GV03sb_10_u:614_1: prājāpatyamālabhanta eṣa vā aśvamedho ya eṣa tapati tasya saṃvatsara ātmāyamagnirarkastasyeme
GV03sb_10_u:615_0: lokā ātmānastāvetāvarkāmedhau so punarekaiva devatā bhavati mṛtyurevāpa punarmṛtyuṃ jayati nainam mṛtyurāpnoti mṛtyurasyātmā
GV03sb_10_u:615_1: bhavati sarvamāyuretyetāsāṃ devatānāmeko bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV03sb_10_u:616_1: vātsyādvātsyaḥ śāṇḍilyācāṇḍilyaḥ kuśreḥ kuśriryajñavacaso rājastambāyanādyajñavacā rājastambāyanasturātkāvaṣeyātturaḥ kāvaṣeyaḥ
GV03sb_10_u:616_2: prajāpateḥ prajāpatirbrahmaṇo brahma svayambhu brahmaṇe namaḥ
